blocks.name: co
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include the value of an operation ` F ` (such as ` + ` ) for two arguments ` A ` and ` B ` . Note that the syntax is simply three class symbols in a row surrounded by parentheses. Since operation values are the only possible class expressions consisting of three class expressions in a row surrounded by parentheses, the syntax is unambiguous. (For an example of how syntax could become ambiguous if we are not careful, see the comment in ~ cneg .)
blocks.origin: prop class co(class c0, class c1, class c2) { (c0[c1]c2) }

blocks.name: diff.co.s
diff.co.c
diff.co.w
coprab
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include class abstraction (class builder) of nested ordered pairs.
blocks.origin: prop class coprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) { { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } }

blocks.name: diff.coprab.s
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.coprab.s(setvar sBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- diffsc(sBase, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
  -| diffss(sBase, s0)
  -| diffss(sBase, s1)
  -| diffss(sBase, s2)
  -| diffsw(sBase, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.coprab.s(setvar sBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ d(sBase, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 })
  ⊣ d(sBase, s0)
  ⊣ d(sBase, s1)
  ⊣ d(sBase, s2)
  ⊣ d(sBase, w0)
}

blocks.name: diff.coprab.c
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.coprab.c(class cBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- diffcc(cBase, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
  -| diffsc(s0, cBase)
  -| diffsc(s1, cBase)
  -| diffsc(s2, cBase)
  -| diffcw(cBase, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.coprab.c(class cBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ d(cBase, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 })
  ⊣ d(s0, cBase)
  ⊣ d(s1, cBase)
  ⊣ d(s2, cBase)
  ⊣ d(cBase, w0)
}

blocks.name: diff.coprab.w
blocks.origin:
axiom diff.coprab.w(wff wBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- diffcw(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), wBase)
  -| diffsw(s0, wBase)
  -| diffsw(s1, wBase)
  -| diffsw(s2, wBase)
  -| diffww(wBase, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
axiom diff.coprab.w(wff wBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ d({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, wBase)
  ⊣ d(s0, wBase)
  ⊣ d(s1, wBase)
  ⊣ d(s2, wBase)
  ⊣ d(wBase, w0)
}

blocks.name: cmpo

}

  ⊣ d(sBase, s1)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c0)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c1)
  ⊣ d(sBase, c2)
}

axiom diff.cmpo.c(class cBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

blocks.name: diff.cmpo.w

axiom diff.cmpo.w(wff wBase, setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  -| diffsw(s0, wBase)

blocks.name: df-ov
blocks.content: Define the value of an operation. Definition of operation value in [Enderton] p. 79. Note that the syntax is simply three class expressions in a row bracketed by parentheses. There are no restrictions of any kind on what those class expressions may be, although only certain kinds of class expressions - a binary operation ` F ` and its arguments ` A ` and ` B ` - will be useful for proving meaningful theorems. For example, if class ` F ` is the operation ` + ` and arguments ` A ` and ` B ` are ` 3 ` and ` 2 ` , the expression ` ( 3 + 2 ) ` can be proved to equal ` 5 ` (see ~ 3p2e5 ). This definition is well-defined, although not very meaningful, when classes ` A ` and/or ` B ` are proper classes (i.e. are not sets); see ~ ovprc1 and ~ ovprc2 . On the other hand, we often find uses for this definition when ` F ` is a proper class, such as ` +o ` in ~ oav . ` F ` is normally equal to a class of nested ordered pairs of the form defined by ~ df-oprab . (Contributed by NM, 28-Feb-1995.)

blocks.name: df-oprab
blocks.content: Define the class abstraction (class builder) of a collection of nested ordered pairs (for use in defining operations). This is a special case of Definition 4.16 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 14. Normally ` x ` , ` y ` , and ` z ` are distinct, although the definition doesn't strictly require it. See ~ df-ov for the value of an operation. The brace notation is called "class abstraction" by Quine; it is also called a "class builder" in the literature. The value of the most common operation class builder is given by ~ ovmpt2 . (Contributed by NM, 12-Mar-1995.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-oprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), cab(s3, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s3), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
}

blocks.name: df-mpo
blocks.content: Define maps-to notation for defining an operation via a rule. Read as "the operation defined by the map from ` x , y ` (in ` A X. B ` ) to ` C ( x , y ) ` ". An extension of ~ df-mpt for two arguments. (Contributed by NM, 17-Feb-2008.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-mpo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(s2), c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
}

blocks.name: ovrspc2v
blocks.content: If an operation value is element of a class for all operands of two classes, then the operation value is an element of the class for specific operands of the two classes. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovrspc2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5)))), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5)))), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  rspc2va(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c5))
  eleq1d(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5, co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c4, cv(s1))
  eleq1d(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c5, co(c0, c4, c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c5)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(c0, c4, c2), c5)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ovrspc2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c5)))→(c0[c4]c2)∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii((((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c5)))→(c0[c4]c2)∈ c5), d(s1, c1))
  rspc2va(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (s0[c4]s1)∈ c5, (c0[c4]c2)∈ c5, (c0[c4]s1)∈ c5)
  eleq1d((s0[c4]s1), c5, (c0[c4]s1), s0 = c0)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c4, s1)
  eleq1d((c0[c4]s1), c5, (c0[c4]c2), s1 = c2)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0[c4]s1), c5)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, (c0[c4]c2), c5)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
}

blocks.name: oveqrspc2v
blocks.content: Restricted specialization of operands, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm oveqrspc2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), co(c0, c5, c2)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpan9(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), co(c0, c5, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c3, w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))))
  rspc2v(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), co(c0, c5, c2)), wceq(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s1))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c4, cv(s1))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c5, cv(s1))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c4, c2), co(c0, c5, c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c4)
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c5)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c5, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(c0, c4, c2), co(c0, c5, c2))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c5, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oveqrspc2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))→(c0[c4]c2)=(c0[c5]c2))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))→(s0[c4]s1)=(s0[c5]s1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpan9(w0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c0[c4]c2)=(c0[c5]c2), ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)=(s0[c5]s1))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c3, w0, (s0[c4]s1)=(s0[c5]s1))
  rspc2v(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (s0[c4]s1)=(s0[c5]s1), (c0[c4]c2)=(c0[c5]c2), (c0[c4]s1)=(c0[c5]s1))
  eqeq12d((s0[c4]s1), (s0[c5]s1), (c0[c4]s1), (c0[c5]s1), s0 = c0)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c4, s1)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c5, s1)
  eqeq12d((c0[c4]s1), (c0[c5]s1), (c0[c4]c2), (c0[c5]c2), s1 = c2)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c4)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c5)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c0[c4]s1), (c0[c5]s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c5, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (c0[c4]c2), (c0[c5]c2))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c5, c2)
}

blocks.name: oprabid
blocks.content: The law of concretion. Special case of Theorem 9.5 of [Quine] p. 61. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 20-Mar-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprabid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w0)
} = {
  elab2(hs0, cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))))
  opex(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  impbid(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))), w0)
  mpcom(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wi(wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))), w0), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))
  biimpi(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), wex(hs1, wex(hs2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wceq(cop(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))))))

  diff.cv.s(s2, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs4)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs4)
  diff.hs4.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: csbov123
blocks.content: Move class substitution in and out of an operation. (Contributed by NM, 12-Nov-2005.) (Revised by NM, 23-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbov123(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(csb(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))), wcel(c0, universe))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, wceq(csb(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))), wceq(csb(s0, cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3)), co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))))
  eqeq12d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3)), co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)), csb(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, co(c1, c2, c3))
  oveq123d(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c2)
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  csbeq1(s0, cv(hs0), c0, c3)
  csbief(s0, cv(hs0), co(c1, c2, c3), co(csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3)))
  vex(hs0)
  nfov(s0, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3))
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  oveq123d(c1, c2, c3, csb(s0, cv(hs0), c1), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c2), csb(s0, cv(hs0), c3), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  eqtrd(csb(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3))
  syl5req(emptycls, co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), cfv(csb(s0, c0, c2), cop(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c3))), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  df-ov(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))
  syl6eq(cfv(csb(s0, c0, c2), cop(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c3))), emptycls, cfv(emptycls, cop(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c3))), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  fveq1d(csb(s0, c0, c2), cop(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c3)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
  0fv(cop(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csb(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbov123(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ [c0 / s0](c1[c2]c3)=([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3)
} = {
  pm2.61i([c0 / s0](c1[c2]c3)=([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, universe, [c0 / s0](c1[c2]c3)=([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3), [hs0 / s0](c1[c2]c3)=([hs0 / s0]c1[[hs0 / s0]c2][hs0 / s0]c3))
  eqeq12d([hs0 / s0](c1[c2]c3), ([hs0 / s0]c1[[hs0 / s0]c2][hs0 / s0]c3), [c0 / s0](c1[c2]c3), ([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3), hs0 = c0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, (c1[c2]c3))
  oveq123d([hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, [c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3, hs0 = c0)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c2)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c1)
  csbeq1(s0, hs0, c0, c3)
  csbief(s0, hs0, (c1[c2]c3), ([hs0 / s0]c1[[hs0 / s0]c2][hs0 / s0]c3))
  vex(hs0)
  nfov(s0, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s0, hs0, c3)
  oveq123d(c1, c2, c3, [hs0 / s0]c1, [hs0 / s0]c2, [hs0 / s0]c3, s0 = hs0)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c2)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c1)
  csbeq1a(s0, hs0, c3)
  eqtrd([c0 / s0](c1[c2]c3), ([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3), emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbprc(s0, c0, (c1[c2]c3))
  syl5req(emptycls, ([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3), ([c0 / s0]c2 ` <[c0 / s0]c1,[c0 / s0]c3 >), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  df-ov([c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3)
  syl6eq(([c0 / s0]c2 ` <[c0 / s0]c1,[c0 / s0]c3 >), emptycls, (∅ ` <[c0 / s0]c1,[c0 / s0]c3 >), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  fveq1d([c0 / s0]c2, <[c0 / s0]c1,[c0 / s0]c3 >, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
  0fv(<[c0 / s0]c1,[c0 / s0]c3 >)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w([c0 / s0](c1[c2]c3)=([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: csbov
blocks.content: Move class substitution in and out of an operation. (Contributed by NM, 23-Aug-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbov(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(csb(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtri(csb(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3), co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)))
  csbov123(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  pm2.61i(wceq(co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), co(c1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3)), wcel(c0, universe))
  oveq12d(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), c1, c3, wcel(c0, universe))
  csbconstg(s0, c0, universe, c1)
  csbconstg(s0, c0, universe, c3)
  3eqtr4a(co(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3)), co(c1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3), co(csb(s0, c0, c1), emptycls, csb(s0, c0, c3)), co(c1, emptycls, c3), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  3eqtr4ri(co(csb(s0, c0, c1), emptycls, csb(s0, c0, c3)), co(c1, emptycls, c3), cfv(emptycls, cop(c1, c3)), emptycls)
  0fv(cop(c1, c3))
  df-ov(c1, emptycls, c3)
  0ov(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c3))
  oveqd(csb(s0, c0, c1), csb(s0, c0, c2), csb(s0, c0, c3), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  oveqd(c1, csb(s0, c0, c2), c3, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbov(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ [c0 / s0](c1[c2]c3)=(c1[[c0 / s0]c2]c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  eqtri([c0 / s0](c1[c2]c3), (c1[[c0 / s0]c2]c3), ([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3))
  csbov123(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  pm2.61i(([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3)=(c1[[c0 / s0]c2]c3), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  oveq12d([c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3, c1, c3, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbconstg(s0, c0, universe, c1)
  csbconstg(s0, c0, universe, c3)
  3eqtr4a(([c0 / s0]c1[[c0 / s0]c2][c0 / s0]c3), (c1[[c0 / s0]c2]c3), ([c0 / s0]c1[∅][c0 / s0]c3), (c1[∅]c3), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  3eqtr4ri(([c0 / s0]c1[∅][c0 / s0]c3), (c1[∅]c3), (∅ ` < c1, c3 >), emptycls)
  0fv(< c1, c3 >)
  df-ov(c1, emptycls, c3)
  0ov([c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c3)
  oveqd([c0 / s0]c1, [c0 / s0]c2, [c0 / s0]c3, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  oveqd(c1, [c0 / s0]c2, c3, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  csbprc(s0, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: rspceov
blocks.content: A frequently used special case of ~ rspc2ev for operation values. (Contributed by NM, 21-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm rspceov(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(c4, co(c0, c5, c2))), wrex(s0, c1, wrex(s1, c3, wceq(c4, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  rspc2ev(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(c4, co(c0, c5, c2)), wceq(c4, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1))), wceq(c4, co(c0, c5, cv(s1))))
  eqeq2d(c4, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c5, cv(s1))
  eqeq2d(c4, co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c5)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c4, co(c0, c5, cv(s1)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c5, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c4, co(c0, c5, c2))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c5, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rspceov(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 =(c0[c5]c2))→ ∃(s0 ∈ c1, ∃(s1 ∈ c3, c4 =(s0[c5]s1))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
} = {
  rspc2ev(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4 =(c0[c5]c2), c4 =(s0[c5]s1), c4 =(c0[c5]s1))
  eqeq2d(c4, (s0[c5]s1), (c0[c5]s1), s0 = c0)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c5, s1)
  eqeq2d(c4, (c0[c5]s1), (c0[c5]c2), s1 = c2)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c5)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c4, (c0[c5]s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c5, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c4, (c0[c5]c2))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c5, c2)
}

blocks.name: elovimad
blocks.content: Elementhood of the image set of an operation value. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 13-Mar-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm elovimad(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), cima(c1, cxp(c3, c4))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wfun(c1))
  -| wi(w0, wss(cxp(c3, c4), cdm(c1)))
} = {
  syl5eqel(co(c0, c1, c2), cima(c1, cxp(c3, c4)), cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), w0)
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  mpd(w0, wcel(cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), cima(c1, cxp(c3, c4))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c3, c4)))
  syl2anc(w0, wi(wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c3, c4)), wcel(cfv(c1, cop(c0, c2)), cima(c1, cxp(c3, c4)))), wfun(c1), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1)))
  sseldd(cop(c0, c2), cdm(c1), cxp(c3, c4), w0)
  opelxpd(c0, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  funfvima(c1, cop(c0, c2), cxp(c3, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elovimad(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)∈(c1 "(c3 × c4)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → Fun(c1))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c3 × c4)⊆ dom(c1))
} = {
  syl5eqel((c0[c1]c2), (c1 "(c3 × c4)), (c1 ` < c0, c2 >), w0)
  df-ov(c0, c1, c2)
  mpd(w0, (c1 ` < c0, c2 >)∈(c1 "(c3 × c4)), < c0, c2 > ∈(c3 × c4))
  syl2anc(w0, (< c0, c2 > ∈(c3 × c4)→(c1 ` < c0, c2 >)∈(c1 "(c3 × c4))), Fun(c1), < c0, c2 > ∈ dom(c1))
  sseldd(< c0, c2 >, dom(c1), (c3 × c4), w0)
  opelxpd(c0, c2, c3, c4, w0)
  funfvima(c1, < c0, c2 >, (c3 × c4))
}

blocks.name: fnbrovb

blocks.name: opabbrex
blocks.content: A collection of ordered pairs with an extension of a binary relation is a set. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Nov-2017.) (Revised by BJ/AV, 20-Jun-2019.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: opabresex2d

blocks.name: fvmptopab
blocks.content: The function value of a mapping ` M ` to a restricted binary relation expressed as an ordered-pair class abstraction: The restricted binary relation is a binary relation given as value of a function ` F ` restricted by the condition ` ps ` . (Contributed by AV, 31-Jan-2021.) (Revised by AV, 29-Oct-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm fvmptopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), w1))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s2), c1)), wb(w2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(copab(s0, s1, wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1))), universe))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s2, universe, copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s1)), w2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), w1)))), diffss(s0, s1))
  pm2.61i(wi(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), w1)))), wcel(c1, universe))
  ex(wcel(c1, universe), w0, wceq(cfv(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), w1))))
  fvmptd2(s2, c0, c1, copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), w1)), universe, copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s1)), w2)), universe, wa(wcel(c1, universe), w0))
  opabbidv(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(c1, universe), w0), wceq(cv(s2), c1)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s1)), w2), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), w1))
  anbi12d(wa(wa(wcel(c1, universe), w0), wceq(cv(s2), c1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s1)), w2, wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), w1)
  adantl(wa(wcel(c1, universe), w0), wceq(cv(s2), c1), wb(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, cv(s2)), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1))))

  gen2(s0, s1, wi(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1))))

  eqtr4d(cfv(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wbr(cv(s0), cfv(c2, c1), cv(s1)), w1)), emptycls, wn(wcel(c1, universe)))

thm fvmptopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ` c1)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)})
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s2 = c1)→(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → { < s0, s1 > | s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 } ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ c0 =(s2 ∈ 𝕌 ↦ { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` s2)]s1 ∧ w2)})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
} = {
  a1ii((w0 →(c0 ` c1)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)}), d(s0, s1))
  pm2.61i((w0 →(c0 ` c1)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)}), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ex(c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0, (c0 ` c1)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)})
  fvmptd2(s2, c0, c1, { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)}, universe, { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` s2)]s1 ∧ w2)}, universe, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0))
  opabbidv(s0, s1, ((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0)∧ s2 = c1), (s0[(c2 ` s2)]s1 ∧ w2), (s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1))
  anbi12d(((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0)∧ s2 = c1), s0[(c2 ` s2)]s1, w2, s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1, w1)
  adantl((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0), s2 = c1, (s0[(c2 ` s2)]s1 ↔ s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1))
  breqd(s0, (c2 ` s2), s1, (c2 ` c1), s2 = c1)
  fveq2(s2, c1, c2)
  adantll(c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0, s2 = c1, (w2 ↔ w1))
  simpl(c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0)
  sylancr((c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0), { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)} ∈ 𝕌, ∀(s0, ∀(s1,(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 → s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1))), { < s0, s1 > | s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 } ∈ 𝕌)
  gen2(s0, s1, (s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 → s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1))
  id(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1)
  adantl(c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0, { < s0, s1 > | s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 } ∈ 𝕌)
  opabbrex(s0, s1, (c2 ` c1), universe, s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1, w1)
  a1d(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0, (c0 ` c1)= { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)})
  eqtr4d((c0 ` c1), { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)}, emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c1, c0)
  sylibr(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, { < s0, s1 > |(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1)} = ∅, ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ¬(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1))))
  alrimivv(s0, s1, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, ¬(s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1))
  intnanrd(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1, w1)
  mtbiri(¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌, s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1, s0[∅]s1)
  br0(s0, s1)
  breqd(s0, (c2 ` c1), s1, emptycls, ¬ c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvprc(c1, c2)
  opab0(s0, s1, (s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1))
  diff.copab.s(s2, s0, s1, (s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1 ∧ w1))
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0[(c2 ` c1)]s1, w1)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s0, (c2 ` c1), s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.wa.s(s2, c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0), s2 = c1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, s2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0), s2 = c1)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c1 ∈ 𝕌, w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s2, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wn.s(s0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wn.s(s1, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c1, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

  |- wb(wf1(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c1, wral(s3, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

} = {
  bitri(wf1(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wral(s2, c1, wral(s3, c2, wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))))))))), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wral(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wral(hs1, cxp(c1, c2), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))))))

  ralxp(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, wral(hs1, cxp(c1, c2), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)))), wral(hs1, cxp(c1, c2), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1)))))
  ralbidv(hs1, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wi(wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cv(hs1))), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs1))))

  syl6eqr(cfv(c0, cv(hs1)), co(cv(s2), c0, cv(s3)), cfv(c0, cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))), wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3))))
  fveq2(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), c0)

  eqeq2(cv(hs1), cop(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

blocks.name: brfvopab
blocks.content: The classes involved in a binary relation of a function value which is an ordered-pair class abstraction are sets. (Contributed by AV, 7-Jan-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm brfvopab(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  -| wi(wcel(c2, universe), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))), wcel(c2, universe))
  ex(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3)), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))))
  imdistani(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  syl6bi(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wbr(c0, copab(s0, s1, w0), c3))
  breqd(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3, copab(s0, s1, w0), wcel(c2, universe))
  brabv(s0, s1, c0, c3, w0)
  3anass(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  syl(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wi(wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe))), wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls))
  fvprc(c2, c1)
  syl6bi(wceq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls), wbr(c0, cfv(c1, c2), c3), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wbr(c0, emptycls, c3))
  breq(cfv(c1, c2), emptycls, c0, c3)
  pm2.21i(wbr(c0, emptycls, c3), w3a(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c3, universe)))
  br0(c0, c3)
}

  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s2)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s1, cv(s3), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(s3), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
}

blocks.name: reloprab
blocks.content: An operation class abstraction is a relation. (Contributed by NM, 16-Jun-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm reloprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wrel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, s2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reloprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ Rel({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 })
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  relopabi(hs0, s2, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))))
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}

blocks.name: oprabv
blocks.content: If a pair and a class are in a relationship given by a class abstraction of a collection of nested ordered pairs, the involved classes are sets. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 8-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprabv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wbr(cop(c0, c1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wbr(cop(c0, c1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))), diffss(s0, s1))
  mpcom(wbr(cop(c0, c1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wa(wcel(cop(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  brrelex12i(cop(c0, c1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), c2)
  reloprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  adantl(wcel(cop(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c2, universe), wi(wbr(cop(c0, c1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))))
  com12(wcel(c2, universe), wbr(cop(c0, c1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), c2), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  sylbi(wbr(cop(c0, c1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), c2), wi(wcel(c2, universe), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))

  com12(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))), wcel(c2, universe), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  sylbid(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0)))))
  mpan(wcel(c2, universe), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c1), c2), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0))))), wcel(cop(c0, c1), universe))
  opex(c0, c1)
  opelopabgf(hs0, s2, cop(c0, c1), universe, c2, universe, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  nfex(hs0, s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  nfex(hs0, s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  nfan(hs0, wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  nfeq1(hs0, cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  nfcv(hs0, cop(c0, c1))
  nfv(hs0, w0)

  nfex(s2, s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0)))

  nfcv(s2, cop(c0, c1))

  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

  sbceq1a(s2, c2, w0)
  expcom(wcel(c2, universe), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0)))), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  sylibr(wa(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0)))), wcel(c2, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(c2, universe)))
  anim1i(wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0)))), wcel(c2, universe), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  adantr(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wsbc(s2, c2, w0), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  sylbi(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)))
  bitri(wceq(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(c0, c1)))
  eqcom(cop(c0, c1), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  opth(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, c1)
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)

  eqvisset(s0, c0)
  eqvisset(s1, c1)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))

  diff.hs0.c(cop(c0, c1))

  ⊢ (< c0, c1 >[{ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }]c2 →(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)

  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii((< c0, c1 >[{ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }]c2 →(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)), d(s0, s1))

  com12(c2 ∈ 𝕌, < c0, c1 >[{ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }]c2, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  sylbi(< c0, c1 >[{ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }]c2, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)), < < c0, c1 >, c2 > ∈ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 })
  df-br(< c0, c1 >, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, c2)
  eleq2s(< < c0, c1 >, c2 >, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))}, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)))
  com12(< < c0, c1 >, c2 > ∈ { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))}, c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  sylbid(c2 ∈ 𝕌, < < c0, c1 >, c2 > ∈ { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))}, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 > ∧[c2 / s2]w0))))
  mpan(c2 ∈ 𝕌, (< < c0, c1 >, c2 > ∈ { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))} ↔ ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 > ∧[c2 / s2]w0)))), < c0, c1 > ∈ 𝕌)
  opex(c0, c1)
  opelopabgf(hs0, s2, < c0, c1 >, universe, c2, universe, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 > ∧[c2 / s2]w0))), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))))
  nfex(hs0, s0, ∃(s1,(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))

  sylibr((∃(s0, ∃(s1,(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 > ∧[c2 / s2]w0)))∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌), ((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  anim1i(∃(s0, ∃(s1,(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 > ∧[c2 / s2]w0))), c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  exlimivv(s0, s1, (< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 > ∧[c2 / s2]w0), (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  adantr(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 >, [c2 / s2]w0, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  sylbi(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 >, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c1))
  bitri(< c0, c1 > = < s0, s1 >, (s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c1), < s0, s1 > = < c0, c1 >)
  eqcom(< c0, c1 >, < s0, s1 >)

blocks.name: nfoprab1
blocks.content: The abstraction variables in an operation class abstraction are not free. (Contributed by NM, 25-Apr-1995.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfoprab1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wnfc(s0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))))))
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)

blocks.name: nfoprab
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for an operation class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 22-Aug-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfoprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0) {
  |- wnfc(s0, coprab(s1, s2, s3, w0))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, coprab(s1, s2, s3, w0), cab(hs0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))), w0))))))
  df-oprab(s1, s2, s3, hs0, w0)
  nfab(s0, hs0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))), w0)))))
  nfex(s0, s1, wex(s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))), w0))))
  nfex(s0, s2, wex(s3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))), w0)))
  nfex(s0, s3, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))), w0))
  nfan(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))), w0)
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))))
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), cv(s3))
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
}

  ⊣ F/(s0, w0)

  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
} = {

  df-oprab(s1, s2, s3, hs0, w0)
  nfab(s0, hs0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2, ∃(s3,(hs0 = < < s1, s2 >, s3 > ∧ w0)))))
  nfex(s0, s1, ∃(s2, ∃(s3,(hs0 = < < s1, s2 >, s3 > ∧ w0))))
  nfex(s0, s2, ∃(s3,(hs0 = < < s1, s2 >, s3 > ∧ w0)))
  nfex(s0, s3, (hs0 = < < s1, s2 >, s3 > ∧ w0))

blocks.name: oprabbid
blocks.content: Equivalent wff's yield equal operation class abstractions (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jun-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprabbid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnf(s2, w0)
  -| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2))), diffss(s0, s2))
  a1ii(wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2))), diffss(s1, s2))
  3eqtr4g(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1))))), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w2))))), w0)
  abbidv(hs0, w0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w2)))))
  exbid(s0, w0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w2))))
  exbid(s1, w0, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1)), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w2)))
  exbid(s2, w0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w2))
  anbi2d(w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1, w2)
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w1)
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
  diff.hs0.w(w2)
}

blocks.name: oprabbidv
blocks.content: Equivalent wff's yield equal operation class abstractions (deduction form). (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprabbidv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w2)))
  -| wi(w0, wb(w1, w2))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  oprabbid(s0, s1, s2, w0, w1, w2)

  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfv(s2, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oprabbidv(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (w0 → { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w1 } = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w2 })
  ⊣ (w0 →(w1 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  oprabbid(s0, s1, s2, w0, w1, w2)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfv(s1, w0)
  nfv(s2, w0)
}

blocks.name: oprabbii
blocks.content: Equivalent wff's yield equal operation class abstractions. (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprabbii(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1))
  -| wb(w0, w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  ax-mp(wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)))
  eqid(cv(hs0))
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), w0, w1)
  a1i(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs0)), wb(w0, w1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oprabbii(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w1 }
  ⊣ (w0 ↔ w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  ax-mp({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w1 }, hs0 = hs0)
  eqid(hs0)
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, s2, hs0 = hs0, w0, w1)
  a1i(hs0 = hs0, (w0 ↔ w1))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, hs0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

blocks.content: Equivalence of ordered pair abstraction subclass and implication. Compare ~ ssopab2 . (Contributed by FL, 6-Nov-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)

thm ssoprab2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1)))), wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)))
} = {
  3sstr4g(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))))), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1)))))
  ss2abdv(hs0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1)))))
  aleximi(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1))))
  aleximi(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1)), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1)))
  aleximi(s2, wi(w0, w1), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w1))
  anim2d(wi(w0, w1), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0, w1)
  id(wi(w0, w1))
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w1)
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1)))))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
}

blocks.name: ssoprab2b
blocks.content: Equivalence of ordered pair abstraction subclass and implication. Compare ~ ssopab2b . (Contributed by FL, 6-Nov-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssoprab2b(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wb(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1)))))
} = {
  impbii(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1)))))
  alrimi(s0, wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)), wal(s1, wal(s2, wi(w0, w1))))
  nfss(s0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1))
  nfoprab1(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  nfoprab1(s0, s1, s2, w1)
  alrimi(s1, wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)), wal(s2, wi(w0, w1)))
  nfss(s1, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1))
  nfoprab2(s1, s0, s2, w0)
  nfoprab2(s1, s0, s2, w1)
  alrimi(s2, wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)), wi(w0, w1))
  nfss(s2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1))
  nfoprab3(s2, s0, s1, w0)
  nfoprab3(s2, s0, s1, w1)
  3imtr3g(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)), w0, w1, wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)))
  ssel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)))
  oprabid(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  oprabid(s0, s1, s2, w1)
  ssoprab2(s0, s1, s2, w0, w1)
}

blocks.name: mpoeq123
blocks.content: An equality theorem for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Mar-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpoeq123(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5))), diffss(s0, s1))
  3eqtr4g(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c5), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))))
  oprabbid(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))
  nfan(s0, wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)))))
  nfv(s0, wceq(c0, c1))
  nfra1(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))
  nfan(s1, wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)))))
  nfv(s1, wceq(c0, c1))
  nfral(s1, s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfan(s1, wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)))
  nfv(s1, wceq(c2, c3))
  nfra1(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))
  nfv(hs0, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))))
  3bitr4g(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))))
  sylan9bbr(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))))
  pm5.32d(wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))
  syl6(wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))
  rsp(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))
  sylan9bbr(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))
  pm5.32d(wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  syl6(wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5)), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c4), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)), wceq(c4, c5))
  rsp(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))
  eqeq2(c4, c5, cv(hs0))
  anbi1d(wceq(c2, c3), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  eleq2(c2, c3, cv(s1))
  anbi1d(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  eleq2(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  anass(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  anass(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c2, c4)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c3, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c5))))))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

blocks.name: mpoeq12
blocks.content: An equality theorem for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 16-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpoeq12(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  sylan2(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4)), wral(s0, c0, wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c4)))))
  ralrimivw(s0, c0, wceq(c2, c3), wa(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c4))))
  jctr(wceq(c2, c3), wral(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c4)))
  rgenw(s1, c2, wceq(c4, c4))
  eqid(c4)
  mpoeq123(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c4)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpoeq12(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 = c1 ∧ c2 = c3)→(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)=(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  sylan2(c0 = c1, c2 = c3, (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4)=(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), ∀(s0 ∈ c0,(c2 = c3 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, c4 = c4))))
  ralrimivw(s0, c0, c2 = c3, (c2 = c3 ∧ ∀(s1 ∈ c2, c4 = c4)))
  jctr(c2 = c3, ∀(s1 ∈ c2, c4 = c4))
  rgenw(s1, c2, c4 = c4)
  eqid(c4)
  mpoeq123(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c4)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: mpoeq123dva
blocks.content: An equality deduction for the maps-to notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Jan-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpoeq123dva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c0, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c1, c4))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wceq(c2, c5))
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, c5), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))), w0)
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, hs0, w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))
  bitrd(w0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5)))
  pm5.32da(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c5))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c5, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))
  anbi1d(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)))
  bitrd(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c4)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c4)))
  pm5.32da(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c4))
  eleq2d(cv(s1), c1, c4, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  anbi1d(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  eleq2d(cv(s0), c0, c3, w0)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c3, c4, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpoeq123dva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 = c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 = c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1))→ c2 = c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c5), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 = c5)}, w0)
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, hs0, w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 = c5))
  bitrd(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ((s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4)∧ hs0 = c5), ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c5))
  pm5.32da(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2, hs0 = c5)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c5, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)))
  anbi1d(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c5, (s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4))
  bitrd(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), (s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c4), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c4))
  pm5.32da(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c4)
  eleq2d(s1, c1, c4, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  anbi1d(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c4, s0 ∈ c3)
  eleq2d(s0, c0, c3, w0)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c3, c4, c5)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
}

thm mpoeq123i(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, c5))
  -| wceq(c0, c3)
  -| wceq(c1, c4)
  -| wceq(c2, c5)
} = {
  mptru(wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, c5)))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wceq(c0, c3))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(c1, c4))
  a1i(wtru, wceq(c2, c5))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpoeq123i(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c5)
  ⊣ c0 = c3
  ⊣ c1 = c4
  ⊣ c2 = c5
} = {
  mptru((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s0 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c4 ↦ c5))
  mpoeq123dv(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, c0 = c3)
  a1i(wtru, c1 = c4)
  a1i(wtru, c2 = c5)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
}

thm mpt2eq3dva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))))

blocks.pretty:
thm mpt2eq3dva(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ c2 = c3)

  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3eqtr4g((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c3)}, w0)
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, hs0, w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c3))
  pm5.32da(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2, hs0 = c3)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c3, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)))
  3expb(w0, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, c2 = c3)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}

thm nfmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {

  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))

  nfcri(s0, s2, c1)

  diff.hs0.s(s1)

blocks.name: mpt20
blocks.content: A mapping operation with empty domain. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 29-Jan-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 15-May-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt20(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, emptycls, c0, c1), emptycls)
} = {
  3eqtri(cmpo(s0, s1, emptycls, c0, c1), emptycls, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), cab(hs1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))))))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, emptycls, c0, c1)
  df-oprab(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  abf(hs1, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))))
  nex(s0, wex(s1, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  nex(s1, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))))
  nex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  mto(wa(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))), wcel(cv(s0), emptycls))
  noel(cv(s0))
  simprll(wceq(cv(hs1), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(hs0))), wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpt20(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ ∅, s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)= ∅
} = {
  3eqtri((s0 ∈ ∅, s1 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), emptycls, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1)}, { hs1 | ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(hs0,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > ∧((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1)))))})
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, emptycls, c0, c1)
  df-oprab(s0, s1, hs0, hs1, ((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1))
  abf(hs1, ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(hs0,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > ∧((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1))))))
  nex(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(hs0,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > ∧((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1)))))
  nex(s1, ∃(hs0,(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > ∧((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1))))
  nex(hs0, (hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > ∧((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1)))
  mto((hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > ∧((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1)), s0 ∈ ∅)
  noel(s0)
  simprll(hs1 = < < s0, s1 >, hs0 >, s0 ∈ ∅, s1 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs1.w(((s0 ∈ ∅ ∧ s1 ∈ c0)∧ hs0 = c1))
}

blocks.name: cbvoprab1
blocks.content: Rule used to change first bound variable in an operation abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 20-Dec-2008.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvoprab1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s3, s1, s2, w1))
  -| wnf(s3, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s3, s1, s2, w1), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s3, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1))), w1)))))
  opabbii(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wex(s3, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1))), w1))))
  cbvexv1(s0, s3, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)), wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1))), w1)))
  nfex(s3, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  nfan(s3, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  nfv(s3, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  nfex(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1))), w1))
  nfan(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1))), w1)
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1))))
  exbidv(s1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1))), w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1))), w1)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s3)))
  opeq1(cv(s0), cv(s3), cv(s1))
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  dfoprab2(s3, s1, s2, hs0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s1)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(s3), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cv(s3))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cbvoprab1(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } = { < < s3, s1 >, s2 > | w1 }
  ⊣ F/(s3, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ (s0 = s3 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  3eqtr4i({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < < s3, s1 >, s2 > | w1 }, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))}, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s3, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s3, s1 > ∧ w1)))})
  opabbii(hs0, s2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))), ∃(s3, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s3, s1 > ∧ w1))))
  cbvexv1(s0, s3, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)), ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s3, s1 > ∧ w1)))
  nfex(s3, s1, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))
  nfan(s3, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0)
  nfv(s3, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  nfex(s0, s1, (hs0 = < s3, s1 > ∧ w1))
  nfan(s0, hs0 = < s3, s1 >, w1)
  nfv(s0, hs0 = < s3, s1 >)
  exbidv(s1, s0 = s3, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0), (hs0 = < s3, s1 > ∧ w1))
  anbi12d(s0 = s3, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0, hs0 = < s3, s1 >, w1)
  eqeq2d(hs0, < s0, s1 >, < s3, s1 >, s0 = s3)
  opeq1(s0, s3, s1)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  dfoprab2(s3, s1, s2, hs0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs0, < s0, s1 >)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, < s3, s1 >)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, s3, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
}

blocks.name: cbvoprab2
blocks.content: Change the second bound variable in an operation abstraction. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 11-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvoprab2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s3, s2, w1))
  -| wnf(s3, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s3, s2, w1)), diffss(s0, s2))
  3eqtr4i(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s3, s2, w1), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))))), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s3, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s2))), w1))))))
  abbii(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s3, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s2))), w1)))))
  exbii(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0))), wex(s3, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s2))), w1))))
  cbvexv1(s1, s3, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0)), wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s2))), w1)))

  exbidv(s2, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s2))), w1))
  anbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))), w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s2))), w1)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s3)), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)))
  opeq1d(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2), cop(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)))

thm cbvoprab2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } = { < < s0, s3 >, s2 > | w1 }
  ⊣ F/(s3, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w1)
  ⊣ (s1 = s3 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  a1ii({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } = { < < s0, s3 >, s2 > | w1 }, d(s0, s2))
  3eqtr4i({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < < s0, s3 >, s2 > | w1 }, { hs0 | ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧ w0))))}, { hs0 | ∃(s0, ∃(s3, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 > ∧ w1))))})
  abbii(hs0, ∃(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧ w0)))), ∃(s0, ∃(s3, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 > ∧ w1)))))
  exbii(s0, ∃(s1, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧ w0))), ∃(s3, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 > ∧ w1))))
  cbvexv1(s1, s3, ∃(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧ w0)), ∃(s2,(hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 > ∧ w1)))
  nfex(s3, s2, (hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧ w0))

  nfv(s3, hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)
  nfex(s1, s2, (hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 > ∧ w1))
  nfan(s1, hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 >, w1)
  nfv(s1, hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 >)
  exbidv(s2, s1 = s3, (hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∧ w0), (hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 > ∧ w1))
  anbi12d(s1 = s3, hs0 = < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, w0, hs0 = < < s0, s3 >, s2 >, w1)
  eqeq2d(hs0, < < s0, s1 >, s2 >, < < s0, s3 >, s2 >, s1 = s3)
  opeq1d(< s0, s1 >, s2, < s0, s3 >, s1 = s3)
  opeq2(s1, s3, s0)
  df-oprab(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  df-oprab(s0, s3, s2, hs0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs0, < < s0, s1 >, s2 >)

blocks.name: cbvoprab12
blocks.content: Rule used to change first two bound variables in an operation abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 21-Feb-2004.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 22-Oct-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvoprab12(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s3, s4, s2, w1))
  -| wnf(s3, w0)
  -| wnf(s4, w0)
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s1, w1)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s4))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s3, s4, s2, w1), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s3, wex(s4, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))), w1)))))
  opabbii(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wex(s3, wex(s4, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))), w1))))
  cbvex2(s0, s1, s3, s4, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))), w1))
  nfan(s3, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  nfv(s3, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  nfan(s4, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  nfv(s4, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  nfan(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))), w1)
  nfv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))))
  nfan(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))), w1)
  nfv(s1, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s4))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4))), w1)
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s4))))
  opeq12(cv(s0), cv(s3), cv(s1), cv(s4))
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  dfoprab2(s3, s4, s2, hs0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s4, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cv.s(s4, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s4, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s4, s0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s1)
  diffss.ex(s4, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4)))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s0, cv(s3), cv(s4))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s4)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s3), cv(s4)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s1, cv(s3), cv(s4))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s4)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diffss.ex(s4, s2)
  diffss.ex(s4, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s4)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
}

thm cbvoprab12(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } = { < < s3, s4 >, s2 > | w1 }
  ⊣ F/(s3, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s4, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w1)
  ⊣ ((s0 = s3 ∧ s1 = s4)→(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)

  ⊣ d(s0, s4)

  ⊣ d(s1, s4)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s4)
  ⊣ d(s3, s4)
} = {
  3eqtr4i({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < < s3, s4 >, s2 > | w1 }, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))}, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s3, ∃(s4,(hs0 = < s3, s4 > ∧ w1)))})
  opabbii(hs0, s2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))), ∃(s3, ∃(s4,(hs0 = < s3, s4 > ∧ w1))))
  cbvex2(s0, s1, s3, s4, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0), (hs0 = < s3, s4 > ∧ w1))
  nfan(s3, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0)
  nfv(s3, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  nfan(s4, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0)
  nfv(s4, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  nfan(s0, hs0 = < s3, s4 >, w1)
  nfv(s0, hs0 = < s3, s4 >)
  nfan(s1, hs0 = < s3, s4 >, w1)
  nfv(s1, hs0 = < s3, s4 >)
  anbi12d((s0 = s3 ∧ s1 = s4), hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0, hs0 = < s3, s4 >, w1)
  eqeq2d(hs0, < s0, s1 >, < s3, s4 >, (s0 = s3 ∧ s1 = s4))
  opeq12(s0, s3, s1, s4)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  dfoprab2(s3, s4, s2, hs0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs0, < s0, s1 >)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s4, hs0, < s0, s1 >)
  diff.cv.s(s4, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s4, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s0)
  diffss.ex(s4, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s4, s1)
  diffss.ex(s4, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, < s3, s4 >)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)

  diff.cv.s(s0, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s4)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, < s3, s4 >)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s1, s3, s4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s4)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s2)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)

  diffss.ex(s4, s2)
  diffss.ex(s4, hs0)

blocks.name: cbvoprab12v
blocks.content: Rule used to change first two bound variables in an operation abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 8-Oct-2004.)

thm cbvoprab12v(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s3, s4, s2, w1))
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s4))), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
  -| diffsw(s4, w0)
} = {
  cbvoprab12(s0, s1, s2, s3, s4, w0, w1)
  nfv(s3, w0)
  nfv(s4, w0)
  nfv(s0, w1)
  nfv(s1, w1)
}

blocks.content: Rule used to change the third bound variable in an operation abstraction, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 22-Aug-2013.)

thm cbvoprab3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s3, w1))
  -| wnf(s3, w0)
  -| wnf(s2, w1)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s3, w1), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), copab(hs0, s3, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))))
  cbvopab2(hs0, s2, s3, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))))
  nfex(s3, s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))
  nfex(s3, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  nfan(s3, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  nfv(s3, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  nfex(s2, s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))
  nfex(s2, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))
  nfan(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)
  nfv(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  2exbidv(s0, s1, wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, w1)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)

thm cbvoprab3(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } = { < < s0, s1 >, s3 > | w1 }
  ⊣ F/(s3, w0)
  ⊣ F/(s2, w1)
  ⊣ (s2 = s3 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
} = {
  3eqtr4i({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < < s0, s1 >, s3 > | w1 }, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))}, { < hs0, s3 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1)))})
  cbvopab2(hs0, s2, s3, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1))))
  nfex(s3, s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))
  nfex(s3, s1, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))

  nfex(s2, s1, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1))
  nfan(s2, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w1)
  nfv(s2, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  2exbidv(s0, s1, s2 = s3, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0), (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1))
  anbi2d(s2 = s3, hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0, w1)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s3, hs0, w1)
  diff.wceq.s(s3, hs0, < s0, s1 >)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diff.cop.s(s3, s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)

thm cbvoprab3v(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s3, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), cv(s3)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
  -| diffsw(s3, w0)
} = {
  cbvoprab3(s0, s1, s2, s3, w0, w1)
  nfv(s3, w0)
  nfv(s2, w1)
}

  cbvoprab12(s0, s1, hs0, s2, s3, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s3), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))

  nfv(s0, wcel(cv(s2), c0))

  nfeq2(s1, cv(hs0), c4)
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s3), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  anbi12d(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c0), wcel(cv(s3), c3))
  adantr(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wb(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0)))
  eleq1w(s0, s2, c0)
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3)), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s3), c3), wcel(cv(s1), c3))

thm cbvmpt2x(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s3, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c4)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c4)
  ⊣ (s0 = s2 → c1 = c3)
  ⊣ ((s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3)→ c2 = c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  3eqtr4i((s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2)}, { < < s2, s3 >, hs0 > |((s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c3)∧ hs0 = c4)})
  cbvoprab12(s0, s1, hs0, s2, s3, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ hs0 = c2), ((s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c3)∧ hs0 = c4))
  nfan(s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2)
  nfan(s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s2, s0 ∈ c0)
  nfcri(s2, s1, c1)
  nfeq2(s2, hs0, c2)
  nfan(s3, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2)
  nfan(s3, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  nfv(s3, s0 ∈ c0)
  nfcri(s3, s1, c1)
  nfcv(s3, c1)
  nfeq2(s3, hs0, c2)
  nfan(s0, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c3), hs0 = c4)
  nfan(s0, s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c3)
  nfv(s0, s2 ∈ c0)
  nfcri(s0, s3, c3)
  nfeq2(s0, hs0, c4)
  nfan(s1, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c3), hs0 = c4)
  nfv(s1, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c3))
  nfeq2(s1, hs0, c4)
  anbi12d((s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), hs0 = c2, (s2 ∈ c0 ∧ s3 ∈ c3), hs0 = c4)
  anbi12d((s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3), s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c3)
  adantr(s0 = s2, s1 = s3, (s0 ∈ c0 ↔ s2 ∈ c0))
  eleq1w(s0, s2, c0)
  sylan9bb(s0 = s2, s1 = s3, s1 ∈ c1, s3 ∈ c3, s1 ∈ c3)
  eleq2d(s1, c1, c3, s0 = s2)
  eleq1w(s1, s3, c3)
  eqeq2d(hs0, c2, c4, (s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-mpo(s2, s3, hs0, c0, c3, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s3, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, s2, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s2, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s3, c3)
