  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: cbvmpt2
blocks.content: Rule to change the bound variable in a maps-to function, using implicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 17-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm cbvmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s2, s3, c0, c1, c3))
  -| wnfc(s2, c2)
  -| wnfc(s3, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnfc(s1, c3)
  -| wi(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s3))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
} = {
  cbvmpt2x(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c1, c3)
  nfcv(s2, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  eqidd(c1, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
}

thm cbvmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)=(s2 ∈ c0, s3 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ F/(s2, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s3, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c3)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c3)
  ⊣ ((s0 = s2 ∧ s1 = s3)→ c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
} = {
  cbvmpt2x(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c1, c3)
  nfcv(s2, c1)
  nfcv(s0, c1)
  eqidd(c1, s0 = s2)
}

thm cbvmpt2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
} = {
  cbvmpt2(s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s2, c2)
  nfcv(s3, c2)
  nfcv(s0, c3)
  nfcv(s1, c3)
  sylan9eq(c2, c3, c4, s0 = s2, s1 = s3)
}

blocks.name: elimdelov
blocks.content: Eliminate a hypothesis which is a predicate expressing membership in the result of an operator (deduction version). (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 25-Mar-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm elimdelov(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), co(cif(c2, c3, w0), c4, cif(c5, c6, w0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c2, c4, c5)))
  -| wcel(c1, co(c3, c4, c6))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wcel(cif(c0, c1, w0), co(cif(c2, c3, w0), c4, cif(c5, c6, w0))), w0)
  3eltr4d(cif(c0, c1, w0), co(cif(c2, c3, w0), c4, cif(c5, c6, w0)), c0, co(c2, c4, c5), w0)
  iftrue(c0, c1, w0)
  oveq12d(cif(c2, c3, w0), c4, cif(c5, c6, w0), c2, c5, w0)
  iftrue(c2, c3, w0)
  iftrue(c5, c6, w0)
  eleqtrrd(cif(c0, c1, w0), co(cif(c2, c3, w0), c4, cif(c5, c6, w0)), co(c3, c4, c6), wn(w0))
  syl6eqel(cif(c0, c1, w0), co(c3, c4, c6), c1, wn(w0))
  iffalse(c0, c1, w0)
  oveq12d(cif(c2, c3, w0), c4, cif(c5, c6, w0), c3, c6, wn(w0))
  iffalse(c2, c3, w0)
  iffalse(c5, c6, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elimdelov(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ if(w0, c0, c1)∈(if(w0, c2, c3)[c4]if(w0, c5, c6))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c2[c4]c5))
  ⊣ c1 ∈(c3[c4]c6)
} = {
  pm2.61i(if(w0, c0, c1)∈(if(w0, c2, c3)[c4]if(w0, c5, c6)), w0)
  3eltr4d(if(w0, c0, c1), (if(w0, c2, c3)[c4]if(w0, c5, c6)), c0, (c2[c4]c5), w0)
  iftrue(c0, c1, w0)
  oveq12d(if(w0, c2, c3), c4, if(w0, c5, c6), c2, c5, w0)
  iftrue(c2, c3, w0)
  iftrue(c5, c6, w0)
  eleqtrrd(if(w0, c0, c1), (if(w0, c2, c3)[c4]if(w0, c5, c6)), (c3[c4]c6), ¬ w0)
  syl6eqel(if(w0, c0, c1), (c3[c4]c6), c1, ¬ w0)
  iffalse(c0, c1, w0)
  oveq12d(if(w0, c2, c3), c4, if(w0, c5, c6), c3, c6, ¬ w0)
  iffalse(c2, c3, w0)
  iffalse(c5, c6, w0)
}

thm dmoprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  3eqtri(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, w0)), cdm(copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))), cab(hs0, wex(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  dmeqi(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  dmopab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  eqtr4i(cab(hs0, wex(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, w0)), cab(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s2, w0))))))
  abbii(hs0, wex(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s2, w0)))))
  bitri(wex(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s2, w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  exrot3(s2, s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  2exbii(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s2, w0)))
  19.42v(s2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  df-opab(s0, s1, hs0, wex(s2, w0))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cop.s(s2, cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.hs0.w(wex(s2, w0))
}

thm dmoprabss(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wss(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), cxp(c0, c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  eqsstri(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), cxp(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))))
  dmoprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))
  eqsstri(copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), cxp(c0, c1), copab(s0, s1, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, w0))))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wex(s2, w0)))
  19.42v(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, wex(s2, w0))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dmoprabss(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0)})⊆(c0 × c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  eqsstri(dom({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0)}), (c0 × c1), { < s0, s1 > | ∃(s2,((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0))})
  dmoprab(s0, s1, s2, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0))
  eqsstri({ < s0, s1 > | ∃(s2,((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0))}, (c0 × c1), { < s0, s1 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ ∃(s2, w0))})
  opabbii(s0, s1, ∃(s2,((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0)), ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ ∃(s2, w0)))
  19.42v(s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), w0)
  opabssxp(s0, s1, c0, c1, ∃(s2, w0))
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

thm rnoprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(crn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), cab(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, w0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  3eqtri(crn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), cab(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, w0))), crn(copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))), cab(s2, wex(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  rneqi(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  rnopab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  abbii(s2, wex(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, w0)))
  bitri(wex(hs0, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), wex(s0, wex(s1, w0)), wex(s0, wex(s1, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  exrot3(hs0, s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))
  2exbii(s0, s1, wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)), w0)
  mpbiran(wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)), w0, wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))))
  isseti(hs0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  opex(cv(s0), cv(s1))
  19.41v(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)

}

  ax-mp(wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), cxp(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), crn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))), wrel(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))
  reloprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  relssdmrn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
  mp2an(wss(cxp(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), crn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))), cxp(cxp(universe, universe), universe)), wss(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), cxp(universe, universe)), wss(crn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), universe))
  mpbi(wss(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), cxp(universe, universe)), wrel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))))
  reldmoprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)

thm eloprabga(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1) {

  -| wi(w3a(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  syl3an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  elex(c2, c3)
  elex(c4, c5)
  vtocle(hs0, cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1)))
  opex(cop(c0, c2), c4)

blocks.content: The law of concretion for operation class abstraction. Compare ~ elopab . (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-1999.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)

  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wb(w3, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  eloprabga(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0, w1)
  syl3an9b(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4), w0, w1, w2, w3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eloprabg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5)→(< < c0, c2 >, c4 > ∈ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = c2 →(w2 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ (s2 = c4 →(w3 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w1)
} = {
  eloprabga(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, w0, w1)
  syl3an9b(s0 = c0, s1 = c2, s2 = c4, w0, w1, w2, w3)
}

blocks.name: ssoprab2i
blocks.content: Inference of operation class abstraction subclass from implication. (Contributed by NM, 11-Nov-1995.) (Revised by David Abernethy, 19-Jun-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssoprab2i(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wss(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1))
  -| wi(w0, w1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  3sstr4i(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1)))))
  ssopab2i(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))), wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))))
  2eximi(s0, s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w1))
  anim2i(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0, w1)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ssoprab2i(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 } ⊆ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w1 }
  ⊣ (w0 → w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  3sstr4i({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w1 }, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))}, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1)))})
  ssopab2i(hs0, s2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))), ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1))))
  2eximi(s0, s1, (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0), (hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w1))
  anim2i(hs0 = < s0, s1 >, w0, w1)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w1)
}

thm mpt2v(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, c0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), c0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  eqtr4i(cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, c0), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), c0)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe)), wceq(cv(s2), c0))))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, s2, universe, universe, c0)
  oprabbii(s0, s1, s2, wceq(cv(s2), c0), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe)), wceq(cv(s2), c0)))
  biantrur(wceq(cv(s2), c0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe))
  vex(s0)
  vex(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
}

blocks.name: mpt2mptx

thm mpt2mptx(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), c2), cmpo(s1, s2, c0, c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cmpt(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), c2), cmpo(s1, s2, c0, c1, c3)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  eqtr4i(cmpt(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), c2), cmpo(s1, s2, c0, c1, c3), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  df-mpt(s0, hs0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), c2)
  eqtr4i(cmpo(s1, s2, c0, c1, c3), copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s1, s2, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  df-mpo(s1, s2, hs0, c0, c1, c3)
  eqtr4i(copab(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s1, s2, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), copab(s0, hs0, wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))))))
  opabbii(s0, hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  3bitr2i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))), wa(wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wex(s1, wex(s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))))))
  eliunxp(s1, s2, cv(s0), c0, c1)
  19.41vv(s1, s2, wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  2exbii(s1, s2, wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  bitri(wa(wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), wa(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))))
  anass(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  pm5.32i(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  anbi2d(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  eqeq2d(cv(hs0), c2, c3, wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  dfoprab2(s1, s2, hs0, s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  diff.hs0.c(ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(hs0), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s1), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, cv(s2), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c3)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: mpt2mpt
blocks.content: Express a two-argument function as a one-argument function, or vice-versa. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Dec-2013.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm mpt2mpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(cmpt(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2), cmpo(s1, s2, c0, c1, c3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtr3i(cmpt(s0, cxp(c0, c1), c2), cmpo(s1, s2, c0, c1, c3), cmpt(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), c2))
  mpteq1i(s0, ciun(s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1)), c2, cxp(c0, c1))
  iunxpconst(s1, c0, c1)
  mpt2mptx(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c0, cxp(csn(cv(s1)), c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, csn(cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mpt2mpt(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (s0 ∈(c0 × c1)↦ c2)=(s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c1 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ (s0 = < s1, s2 > → c2 = c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  eqtr3i((s0 ∈(c0 × c1)↦ c2), (s1 ∈ c0, s2 ∈ c1 ↦ c3), (s0 ∈ ⋃(s1 ∈ c0,({ s1 } × c1))↦ c2))
  mpteq1i(s0, ⋃(s1 ∈ c0,({ s1 } × c1)), c2, (c0 × c1))
  iunxpconst(s1, c0, c1)
  mpt2mptx(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3)
  diff.ciun.s(s0, s1, c0, ({ s1 } × c1))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, { s1 }, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c1)
}

blocks.name: fconstmpt2
blocks.content: Representation of a constant operation using the mapping operation. (Contributed by SO, 11-Jul-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm fconstmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cxp(cxp(c0, c1), csn(c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtri(cxp(cxp(c0, c1), csn(c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpt(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), c2))
  fconstmpt(hs0, cxp(c0, c1), c2)
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c2)
  eqidd(c2, wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c0, c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fconstmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 × c1)× { c2 })=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtri(((c0 × c1)× { c2 }), (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1 ↦ c2), (hs0 ∈(c0 × c1)↦ c2))
  fconstmpt(hs0, (c0 × c1), c2)
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c2)
  eqidd(c2, hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 × c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: resoprab
blocks.content: Restriction of an operation class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 10-Feb-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm resoprab(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wceq(cres(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), cxp(c0, c1)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cres(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), cxp(c0, c1)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))), diffss(s0, s1))
  3eqtr4i(cres(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), cxp(c0, c1)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)), cres(copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))), cxp(c0, c1)), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))))))

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

} = {
  syl5eq(cres(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w0)), cxp(c0, c2)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w0))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  resoprab(s0, s1, s2, c0, c2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w0))
  oprabbidv(s0, s1, s2, wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0))
  syl5bbr(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), w0), wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), w0))
  anass(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w0)
  anbi1d(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)))
  syl5bb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3))))
  an4(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))
  bi2anan9(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2))
  bicomd(wss(c0, c1), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1)), wcel(cv(s0), c0))
  pm4.71d(wss(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s0), c1))
  ssel(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  bicomd(wss(c2, c3), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wcel(cv(s1), c2))

blocks.name: resmpt2
blocks.content: Restriction of the mapping operation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm resmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)), wceq(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4), cxp(c0, c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4), cxp(c0, c2)), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4), cres(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), cxp(c0, c2)), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c2, c3)))
  resoprab2(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  reseq1i(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4), cxp(c0, c2), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c3, c4)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c2, c4)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm resmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)→((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)|`(c0 × c2))=(s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  3eqtr4g(((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)|`(c0 × c2)), (s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c4), ({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ hs0 = c4)} |`(c0 × c2)), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 = c4)}, (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
  resoprab2(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2, c3, hs0 = c4)
  reseq1i((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4), (c0 × c2), { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ hs0 = c4)})
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c3, c4)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c2, c4)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
}

blocks.name: funoprabg
blocks.content: "At most one" is a sufficient condition for an operation class abstraction to be a function. (Contributed by NM, 28-Aug-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm funoprabg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0))), wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  sylib(wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0))), wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), wal(hs0, wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  alrimiv(hs0, wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0))), wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  mosubopt(s0, s1, s2, cv(hs0), w0)
  bitr2i(wal(hs0, wmo(s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))), wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)), wfun(copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))))
  funeqi(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), copab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)))))
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  funopab(hs0, s2, wex(s0, wex(s1, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0))))
  diff.hs0.w(wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, w0))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm funoprabg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∃*(s2, w0)))→ Fun({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  sylib(∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∃*(s2, w0))), Fun({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }), ∀(hs0, ∃*(s2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))))))
  alrimiv(hs0, ∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∃*(s2, w0))), ∃*(s2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))))
  mosubopt(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  bitr2i(∀(hs0, ∃*(s2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))))), Fun({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }), Fun({ < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))}))
  funeqi({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, { < hs0, s2 > | ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0)))})
  dfoprab2(s0, s1, s2, hs0, w0)
  funopab(hs0, s2, ∃(s0, ∃(s1,(hs0 = < s0, s1 > ∧ w0))))
  diff.hs0.w(∀(s0, ∀(s1, ∃*(s2, w0))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)

}

thm fnoprabg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0, wff w1) {

} = {
  sylanbrc(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, weu(s2, w1)))), wfn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(w0, w1)), copab(s0, s1, w0)), wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(w0, w1))), wceq(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(w0, w1))), copab(s0, s1, w0)))
  syl(wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, weu(s2, w1)))), wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(w0, w1))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wmo(s2, wa(w0, w1)))))

  dmoprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(w0, w1))
  opabbid(s0, s1, wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, weu(s2, w1)))), wex(s2, wa(w0, w1)), w0)
  nfa1(s0, wal(s1, wi(w0, weu(s2, w1))))
  nfa2(s1, s0, wi(w0, weu(s2, w1)))

  sps(s1, wi(w0, weu(s2, w1)), wb(wex(s2, wa(w0, w1)), w0))

  imim2i(w0, weu(s2, w1), wex(s2, w1))
  euex(s2, w1)
  19.42v(s2, w0, w1)
  df-fn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(w0, w1)), copab(s0, s1, w0))
}

blocks.name: mpt2fun

blocks.origin:
thm mpt2fun(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wfun(c0)
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
} = {

  gen2(hs0, hs1, wi(wa(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c3))), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs1))))

thm ffnov(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  bitri(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c3)))), wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wral(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3))))
  ffnfv(hs0, c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3)

  ralxp(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3), wcel(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), c3))
  eleq1d(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), c3, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)
  df-ov(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))

  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

}

thm fovcl(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5))

  ax-mp(wral(hs0, c1, wral(hs1, c3, wcel(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c5))), wf(c4, cxp(c1, c3), c5))

  eleq1d(co(cv(hs0), c4, cv(hs1)), c5, co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c4, cv(hs1))
  eleq1d(co(c0, c4, cv(hs1)), c5, co(c0, c4, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0, c4)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c5)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)

}

thm eqfnov(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  ralxp(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, wceq(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), cfv(c3, cv(hs0))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))

  df-ov(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))

blocks.name: eqfnov2
blocks.content: Two operators with the same domain are equal iff their values at each point in the domain are equal. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 7-Jun-2010.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqfnov2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(c3, cxp(c1, c2))), wb(wceq(c0, c3), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wfn(c3, cxp(c1, c2))), wceq(c0, c3), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))), wa(wceq(cxp(c1, c2), cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))))
  eqfnov(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c1, c2)
  impbii(wa(wceq(cxp(c1, c2), cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)))))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))
  simpr(wceq(cxp(c1, c2), cxp(c1, c2)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))
  ancri(wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))), wceq(cxp(c1, c2), cxp(c1, c2)))
  eqidd(cxp(c1, c2), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1))))))
}

blocks.name: fnov
blocks.content: Representation of a function in terms of its values. (Contributed by NM, 7-Feb-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm fnov(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))), wceq(c0, cmpt(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  dffn5(hs0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  eqeq2i(c0, cmpt(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))))
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c0)
  df-ov(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm fnov(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)↔ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦(s0[c0]s1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  bitri(c0[Fn](c1 × c2), c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦(s0[c0]s1)), c0 =(hs0 ∈(c1 × c2)↦(c0 ` hs0)))
  dffn5(hs0, c0, (c1 × c2))
  eqeq2i(c0, (hs0 ∈(c1 × c2)↦(c0 ` hs0)), (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦(s0[c0]s1)))
  mpt2mpt(hs0, s0, s1, c1, c2, (c0 ` hs0), (s0[c0]s1))
  syl6eqr((c0 ` hs0), (s0[c0]s1), (c0 ` < s0, s1 >), hs0 = < s0, s1 >)
  fveq2(hs0, < s0, s1 >, c0)
  df-ov(s0, c0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((s0[c0]s1))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: mpt22eqb
blocks.content: Bidirectional equality theorem for a mapping abstraction. Equivalent to ~ eqfnov2 . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 4-Jan-2017.)

  syl6rbbr(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c4)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, c4))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))))
  syl(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wb(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, c4))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))), wral(s0, c0, wb(wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, c4)), wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))))
  ralimi(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, c4)), wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))))
  syl(wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, c4)), wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))), wral(s1, c1, wb(wceq(c2, c4), wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))))
  ralimi(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3), wb(wceq(c2, c4), wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  pm13.183(hs0, c2, c3, c4)
  ralbi(s1, c1, wceq(c2, c4), wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  ralbi(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wceq(c2, c4)), wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  3bitri(wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c4)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))), wceq(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(hs0, wb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))))
  eqeq12i(cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c4), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c4)
  eqoprab2b(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  bitr4i(wal(s0, wal(s1, wal(hs0, wb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))), wal(s0, wal(s1, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))))
  2albii(s0, s1, wal(hs0, wb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  bitr3i(wal(hs0, wb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))), wal(hs0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))))
  albii(hs0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))), wb(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  pm5.32(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))
  19.21v(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4)))
  r2al(s0, s1, c0, c1, wal(hs0, wb(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c4))))
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
}

blocks.name: rnmpt2
blocks.content: The range of an operation given by the maps-to notation. (Contributed by FL, 20-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm rnmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s1, s2, c1, c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c3))))), diffsc(s0, c0))
  eqtri(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c3)))), crn(coprab(s1, s2, s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c3)))))
  rneqi(c0, coprab(s1, s2, s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c3))))
  eqtri(c0, coprab(s1, s2, s0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), c3))), cmpo(s1, s2, c1, c2, c3))
  df-mpo(s1, s2, s0, c1, c2, c3)
  rnoprab2(s1, s2, s0, c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), c3))
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rnmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ran(c0)= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s0 = c3))}
  ⊣ c0 =(s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(ran(c0)= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s0 = c3))}, d(s0, c0))
  eqtri(ran(c0), { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s0 = c3))}, ran({ < < s1, s2 >, s0 > |((s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2)∧ s0 = c3)}))
  rneqi(c0, { < < s1, s2 >, s0 > |((s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2)∧ s0 = c3)})
  eqtri(c0, { < < s1, s2 >, s0 > |((s1 ∈ c1 ∧ s2 ∈ c2)∧ s0 = c3)}, (s1 ∈ c1, s2 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  df-mpo(s1, s2, s0, c1, c2, c3)
  rnoprab2(s1, s2, s0, c1, c2, s0 = c3)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: reldmmpt2
blocks.content: The domain of an operation defined by maps-to notation is a relation. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 27-Nov-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm reldmmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wrel(cdm(c0))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(wrel(cdm(c0)), diffsc(s1, c1))
  mpbir(wrel(cdm(c0)), wrel(cdm(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))))
  reldmoprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))
  releqi(cdm(c0), cdm(coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3)))))
  dmeqi(c0, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))))
  eqtri(c0, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c3))), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c2, c3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reldmmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ Rel(dom(c0))
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  a1ii(Rel(dom(c0)), d(s1, c1))
  mpbir(Rel(dom(c0)), Rel(dom({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 = c3)})))
  reldmoprab(s0, s1, hs0, ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 = c3))
  releqi(dom(c0), dom({ < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 = c3)}))
  dmeqi(c0, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 = c3)})
  eqtri(c0, { < < s0, s1 >, hs0 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c2)∧ hs0 = c3)}, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c1, c2, c3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c3)

blocks.name: elrnmpt2g
blocks.content: Membership in the range of an operation class abstraction. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 31-Aug-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm elrnmpt2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, crn(c2)), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(c0, c5)))))
  -| wceq(c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c3, c4, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  elab2g(hs0, c0, c1, crn(c2), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(c0, c5))), wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c5))))
  2rexbidv(s0, s1, c3, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c5), wceq(c0, c5))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c5)
  rnmpt2(hs0, s0, s1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c4, wceq(c0, c5))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)

  r19.23v(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2)), w0)

  ralimi(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wal(s2, wi(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2)), w0)), wral(s1, c1, w1)))
  syl5bbr(wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3)), wal(s2, wi(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2)), w0)), wral(s1, c1, w1), wral(s1, c1, wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0))))
  bitri(wral(s1, c1, wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0))), wal(s2, wi(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2)), w0)), wal(s2, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0))))
  ralcom4(s1, s2, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0))
  albii(s2, wral(s1, c1, wi(wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0)), wi(wrex(s1, c1, wceq(cv(s2), c2)), w0))

  ralimi(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3), wb(wal(s2, wi(wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0)), w1))

thm rexrnmpt2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wb(wrex(s2, crn(c4), w0), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1))))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), c2), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w1)
} = {
  3bitr4g(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s2, crn(c4), w0), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)), wn(wral(s2, crn(c4), wn(w0))), wn(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wn(w1)))))
  notbid(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wcel(c2, c3))), wral(s2, crn(c4), wn(w0)), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wn(w1))))
  ralrnmpt2(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, wn(w0), wn(w1))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s2), c2), w0, w1)
  dfrex2(s2, crn(c4), w0)
  bitri(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1)), wn(wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wn(w1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wn(wral(s1, c1, wn(w1)))))
  rexbii(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c1, w1), wn(wral(s1, c1, wn(w1))))
  dfrex2(s1, c1, w1)
  rexnal(s0, c0, wral(s1, c1, wn(w1)))
  diff.wn.s(s0, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s1, w0)
  diff.wn.s(s2, w1)
}

blocks.name: ovid

thm ovid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s2)), w0))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), weu(s2, w0))
  -| wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s2)), w0, wceq(cfv(c2, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)))
  eqeq1i(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s2), cfv(c2, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  df-ov(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cfv(c2, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)), w0, wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c2))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wb(wceq(cfv(c2, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c2)), wfn(c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))))
  mpbir(wfn(c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))), wfn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))))
  fnoprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)
  fneq1i(c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)))
  biimpri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))))
  opabid(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  fnopfvb(c2, copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
  baib(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c2), w0)
  bitri(wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c2), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))))
  eleq2i(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)))
  oprabid(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)

}

blocks.name: ovidig
blocks.content: The value of an operation class abstraction. Compare ~ ovidi . The condition ` ( x e. R /\ y e. S ) ` is been removed. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 29-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm ovidig(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s2)))
  -| wmo(s2, w0)
  -| wceq(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
} = {
  syl5eq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), cv(s2), cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), w0)
  df-ov(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1))
  mpsyl(w0, wceq(cfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), cv(s2)), wfun(c0), wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0))
  mpbir(wfun(c0), wfun(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))
  funoprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  funeqi(c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0))
  syl6eleqr(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), c0, coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0), w0)
  biimpri(w0, wcel(cop(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)))
  oprabid(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  funopfv(c0, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cv(s2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ovidig(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0[c0]s1)= s2)
  ⊣ ∃*(s2, w0)
  ⊣ c0 = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
} = {
  syl5eq((s0[c0]s1), s2, (c0 ` < s0, s1 >), w0)
  df-ov(s0, c0, s1)
  mpsyl(w0, (c0 ` < s0, s1 >)= s2, Fun(c0), < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∈ c0)
  mpbir(Fun(c0), Fun({ < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }))
  funoprab(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  funeqi(c0, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 })
  syl6eleqr(< < s0, s1 >, s2 >, c0, { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 }, w0)
  biimpri(w0, < < s0, s1 >, s2 > ∈ { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > | w0 })
  oprabid(s0, s1, s2, w0)
  funopfv(c0, < s0, s1 >, s2)
}

blocks.name: ovidi

blocks.origin:
thm ovidi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s2))))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wmo(s2, w0))
  -| wceq(c2, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1)), cv(s2)))
  ovidig(s0, s1, s2, c2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0))
  mpbir(wmo(s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wmo(s2, w0)))
  moanimv(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, cv(s1), c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ovidi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(w0 →(s0[c2]s1)= s2))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ ∃*(s2, w0))
  ⊣ c2 = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
} = {
  ex((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), w0, (s0[c2]s1)= s2)
  ovidig(s0, s1, s2, c2, ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0))
  mpbir(∃*(s2,((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)∧ w0)), ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→ ∃*(s2, w0)))
  moanimv(s2, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ c0, s1 ∈ c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s1, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
}

blocks.name: ov

thm ov(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), w0))
  -| wcel(c5, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w3))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s2), c5), wb(w3, w0))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), weu(s2, w1))
  -| wceq(c4, coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bianabs(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), w0)
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w0), wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)), cop(c0, c2)), c5))
  eqeq1i(co(c0, c4, c2), c5, cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)), cop(c0, c2)))
  eqtri(co(c0, c4, c2), cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)), cop(c0, c2)), cfv(c4, cop(c0, c2)))
  df-ov(c0, c4, c2)
  fveq1i(c4, cop(c0, c2), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)))
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)), cop(c0, c2)), c5), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w0), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c5), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1))))
  sylancr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wceq(cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)), cop(c0, c2)), c5), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c5), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)))), wfn(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))))
  fnoprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)
  ibir(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(cop(c0, c2), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))))
  opelopabg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)))
  fnopfvb(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w1)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), cop(c0, c2), c5)

} = {

  syl5eq(co(c0, c6, c2), c4, cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), cop(c0, c2)), wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1)))
  eqtri(co(c0, c6, c2), cfv(coprab(s0, s1, s2, w1), cop(c0, c2)), cfv(c6, cop(c0, c2)))
  df-ov(c0, c6, c2)

  3adant3(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4), wb(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))))

thm ovig(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5)→(w0 →(c0[c6]c2)= c4))
  ⊣ ((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c2 ∧ s2 = c4)→(w1 ↔ w0))
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)→ ∃*(s2, w1))
  ⊣ c6 = { < < s0, s1 >, s2 > |((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ w1)}
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  mpand((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5), w0, (c0[c6]c2)= c4, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  3simpa(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c5)
  ovigg(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)∧ w0), ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ w1))
  anbi12d((s0 = c0 ∧ s1 = c2 ∧ s2 = c4), (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3), w1, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), w0)
  3adant3(s0 = c0, s1 = c2, s2 = c4, ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)↔(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)))
  bi2anan9(s0 = c0, s1 = c2, s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  eleq1(s0, c0, c1)
  eleq1(s1, c2, c3)
  mpbir(∃*(s2,((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)∧ w1)), ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3)→ ∃*(s2, w1)))
  moanimv(s2, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3), w1)
  diff.wa.s(s0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s1, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s2, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), w0)
  diff.wa.s(s2, c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, c2, c3)
  diff.wa.s(s2, s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s2, s0, c1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

thm ovmpt4g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c2))

} = {
  3impia(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c2))
  syl5(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(c2, c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c2), wex(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  elisset(hs0, c2, c3)
  exlimdv(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c2))

  ovidi(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c4, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  a1i(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wmo(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  moeq(hs0, c2)
  eqtri(c4, coprab(s0, s1, hs0, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cmpo(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2))
  df-mpo(s0, s1, hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  eqeq2(cv(hs0), c2, co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)))

  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c2))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)

  diff.hs0.c(c1)

  ⊢ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(s0[c4]s1)= c2)

  nfov(s1, c0, c6, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcxfr(s1, c6, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4))
  nfmpt22(s1, s0, c1, c3, c4)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s1, c2, csb(s0, c0, c4))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c4, universe), wceq(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c4), wcel(csb(s0, c0, c4), universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), csb(s0, c0, c4)))
  eleq1d(c4, universe, csb(s0, c0, c4), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c4, co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), csb(s0, c0, c4), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c6, cv(s1))
  csbeq1a(s0, c0, c4)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(csb(s0, c0, c4), universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), csb(s0, c0, c4)), wcel(csb(s1, c2, csb(s0, c0, c4)), universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, c2), csb(s1, c2, csb(s0, c0, c4))))
  eleq1d(csb(s0, c0, c4), universe, csb(s1, c2, csb(s0, c0, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), csb(s0, c0, c4), co(c0, c6, c2), csb(s1, c2, csb(s0, c0, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c6)
  csbeq1a(s1, c2, csb(s0, c0, c4))
  3expia(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(c4, universe), wceq(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c4))
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4, universe, c6)
  eleq1i(csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c2, c4)), universe, csb(s1, c2, csb(s0, c0, c4)))
  eqeq2i(co(c0, c6, c2), csb(s0, c0, csb(s1, c2, c4)), csb(s1, c2, csb(s0, c0, c4)))
  csbcom(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)

}

thm ovmpt2s(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧[c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4 ∈ c5)→(c0[c6]c2)=[c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4)
  ⊣ c6 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  3impia(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, [c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4 ∈ c5, (c0[c6]c2)=[c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4)
  syl5((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), [c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4 ∈ c5, (c0[c6]c2)=[c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4, [c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex([c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4, c5)
  3imtr4g((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), [c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]c2)=[c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]c2)=[c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4)
  vtocl2gaf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ([c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0[c6]c2)=[c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4), ([c0 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0[c6]s1)=[c0 / s0]c4), (c4 ∈ 𝕌 →(s0[c6]s1)= c4))
  nfim(s0, [c0 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]s1)=[c0 / s0]c4)
  nfel1(s0, [c0 / s0]c4, universe)
  nfeq(s0, (c0[c6]s1), [c0 / s0]c4)
  nfov(s0, c0, c6, s1)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfcxfr(s0, c6, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  nfmpt21(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4)
  nfcv(s0, s1)
  nfcsb1v(s0, c0, c4)
  nfim(s1, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]c2)=[c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4)
  nfel1(s1, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4, universe)
  nfeq(s1, (c0[c6]c2), [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4)
  nfov(s1, c0, c6, c2)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfcxfr(s1, c6, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c4))
  nfmpt22(s1, s0, c1, c3, c4)
  nfcv(s1, c2)
  nfcsb1v(s1, c2, [c0 / s0]c4)
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, c4 ∈ 𝕌, (s0[c6]s1)= c4, [c0 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]s1)=[c0 / s0]c4)
  eleq1d(c4, universe, [c0 / s0]c4, s0 = c0)
  eqeq12d((s0[c6]s1), c4, (c0[c6]s1), [c0 / s0]c4, s0 = c0)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c6, s1)
  csbeq1a(s0, c0, c4)
  imbi12d(s1 = c2, [c0 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]s1)=[c0 / s0]c4, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]c2)=[c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4)
  eleq1d([c0 / s0]c4, universe, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4, s1 = c2)
  eqeq12d((c0[c6]s1), [c0 / s0]c4, (c0[c6]c2), [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4, s1 = c2)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c6)
  csbeq1a(s1, c2, [c0 / s0]c4)
  3expia(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ 𝕌, (s0[c6]s1)= c4)
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, c1, c3, c4, universe, c6)
  eleq1i([c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4, universe, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4)
  eqeq2i((c0[c6]c2), [c0 / s0][c2 / s1]c4, [c2 / s1][c0 / s0]c4)
  csbcom(s0, s1, c0, c2, c4)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ov2gf
blocks.content: The value of an operation class abstraction. A version of ~ ovmpt2g using bound-variable hypotheses. (Contributed by NM, 17-Aug-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 19-Dec-2013.)
blocks.origin:
thm ov2gf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wceq(co(c0, c6, c2), c4))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c7)
  -| wnfc(s1, c4)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(c8, c7))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(c7, c4))
  -| wceq(c6, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c8))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(co(c0, c6, c2), c4))
  syl5(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c5), wceq(co(c0, c6, c2), c4), wcel(c4, universe))
  elex(c4, c5)
  vtocl2gaf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wi(wcel(c4, universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, c2), c4)), wi(wcel(c7, universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), c7)), wi(wcel(c8, universe), wceq(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c8)))
  nfim(s0, wcel(c7, universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), c7))
  nfel1(s0, c7, universe)
  nfeq(s0, co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), c7)
  nfov(s0, c0, c6, cv(s1))
  nfcxfr(s0, c6, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c8))
  nfmpt21(s0, s1, c1, c3, c8)
  nfcv(s0, cv(s1))
  nfim(s1, wcel(c4, universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, c2), c4))
  nfel1(s1, c4, universe)
  nfeq(s1, co(c0, c6, c2), c4)
  nfov(s1, c0, c6, c2)
  nfcxfr(s1, c6, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c3, c8))
  nfmpt22(s1, s0, c1, c3, c8)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c8, universe), wceq(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c8), wcel(c7, universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), c7))
  eleq1d(c8, universe, c7, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c8, co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), c7, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c6, cv(s1))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c7, universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), c7), wcel(c4, universe), wceq(co(c0, c6, c2), c4))
  eleq1d(c7, universe, c4, wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, c6, cv(s1)), c7, co(c0, c6, c2), c4, wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c6)
  3expia(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(c8, universe), wceq(co(cv(s0), c6, cv(s1)), c8))
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, c1, c3, c8, universe, c6)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm ov2gf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c4 ∈ c5)→(c0[c6]c2)= c4)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c2)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c7)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c4)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 → c8 = c7)
  ⊣ (s1 = c2 → c7 = c4)
  ⊣ c6 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c8)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  3impia(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c4 ∈ c5, (c0[c6]c2)= c4)
  syl5((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c4 ∈ c5, (c0[c6]c2)= c4, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c4, c5)
  vtocl2gaf(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (c4 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0[c6]c2)= c4), (c7 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0[c6]s1)= c7), (c8 ∈ 𝕌 →(s0[c6]s1)= c8))
  nfim(s0, c7 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]s1)= c7)
  nfel1(s0, c7, universe)
  nfeq(s0, (c0[c6]s1), c7)
  nfov(s0, c0, c6, s1)
  nfcxfr(s0, c6, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c8))
  nfmpt21(s0, s1, c1, c3, c8)
  nfcv(s0, s1)
  nfim(s1, c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]c2)= c4)
  nfel1(s1, c4, universe)
  nfeq(s1, (c0[c6]c2), c4)
  nfov(s1, c0, c6, c2)
  nfcxfr(s1, c6, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3 ↦ c8))
  nfmpt22(s1, s0, c1, c3, c8)
  imbi12d(s0 = c0, c8 ∈ 𝕌, (s0[c6]s1)= c8, c7 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]s1)= c7)
  eleq1d(c8, universe, c7, s0 = c0)
  eqeq12d((s0[c6]s1), c8, (c0[c6]s1), c7, s0 = c0)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c6, s1)
  imbi12d(s1 = c2, c7 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]s1)= c7, c4 ∈ 𝕌, (c0[c6]c2)= c4)
  eleq1d(c7, universe, c4, s1 = c2)
  eqeq12d((c0[c6]s1), c7, (c0[c6]c2), c4, s1 = c2)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c6)
  3expia(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c3, c8 ∈ 𝕌, (s0[c6]s1)= c8)
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, c1, c3, c8, universe, c6)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: ovmpt2dxf

thm ovmpt2dxf(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c1, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))), wceq(c6, c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(c5, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c7))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c8))
  -| wnf(s0, w0)
  -| wnf(s1, w0)
  -| wnfc(s1, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c2)
  -| wnfc(s0, c3)
  -| wnfc(s1, c3)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  eqtrd(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2), w0)
  oveqd(c0, c1, c2, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wceq(co(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2), c3), wsbc(s0, c0, wsbc(s1, c2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6)))))
  spsbcd(s0, c0, c4, w0, wsbc(s1, c2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6))))
  alrimi(s0, w0, wsbc(s1, c2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6))))
  spsbcd(s1, c2, c7, w0, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6)))
  alrimi(s1, w0, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6)))
  a1i(w0, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6)))
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6, universe, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6))
  sbciedf(s0, c0, c4, w0, wsbc(s1, c2, wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6))), wceq(co(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2), c3))
  sbciedf(s1, c2, c7, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6)), wceq(co(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2), c3))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wcel(c2, c7))
  bitr3d(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6)), wceq(co(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2), c3), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6))
  syl3anc(wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6), wi(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6))), wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c4, c0, wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c0, c4))
  3eltr4d(cv(s1), c5, c2, c7, wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c2, c7))
  adantr(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(c5, c7))
  eqeltrd(c6, universe, c3, wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  ad2antrr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c3, universe))
  elexd(c3, c8, w0)
  biimt(w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c6, universe)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1)), c6, co(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2), c3, wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  oveq12d(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), cv(s1), c0, c2, wa(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2)))
  simplr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  simpr(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  anassrs(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(c6, c3))
  nfan(s1, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  nfeq2(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  a1i(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), wnf(s1, wceq(co(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2), c3)))
  nfeq(s1, co(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2), c3)
  nfov(s1, c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c4, c5, c6), c2)
  nfmpt22(s1, s0, c4, c5, c6)

  oveq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c4, c5)
  sylbid(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(c4, c0, c5), co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5)), w1, wceq(co(c4, c0, c5), c3))
  eqeq2d(co(c4, c0, c5), co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c3, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  eqtr3d(co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c3, co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  oveq12d(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(s1), c4, c5, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cv(s1)), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(c3, c6))
  eqeltrd(cv(s0), c1, c4, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  simprl(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))
  adantr(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(c4, c1))
  eqeltrd(cv(s1), c2, c5, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  simprr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))
  adantrr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c5, c2))
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, c6, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  eqid(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, wceq(cv(s0), c4))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm ovmpt2df(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)→ w1))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 = c4)→ c5 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5))→ c3 ∈ c6)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5))→((c4[c0]c5)= c3 → w1))
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ F/(s1, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  exlimdd(s0, w0, (c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)→ w1), s0 = c4)
  nfv(s0, w0)
  nfim(s0, c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), w1)
  nfeq(s0, c0, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  nfmpt21(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)
  sylib(w0, ∃(s0, s0 = c4), c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  elexd(c4, c1, w0)
  isset(s0, c4)
  exlimimdd(s1, (w0 ∧ s0 = c4), (c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)→ w1), s1 = c5)
  nfv(s1, (w0 ∧ s0 = c4))
  nfim(s1, c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), w1)
  nfeq(s1, c0, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  nfmpt22(s1, s0, c1, c2, c3)
  sylib((w0 ∧ s0 = c4), ∃(s1, s1 = c5), c5 ∈ 𝕌)
  elexd(c5, c2, (w0 ∧ s0 = c4))
  isset(s1, c5)
  expr(w0, s0 = c4, s1 = c5, (c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)→ w1))
  syl5((w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5)), c0 =(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), w1, (c4[c0]c5)=(c4[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)]c5))
  oveq(c0, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), c4, c5)
  sylbid((w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5)), (c4[c0]c5)=(c4[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)]c5), w1, (c4[c0]c5)= c3)
  eqeq2d((c4[c0]c5), (c4[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)]c5), c3, (w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5)))
  eqtr3d((c4[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)]c5), c3, (s0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)]s1), (w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5)))
  oveq12d(s0, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3), s1, c4, c5, (w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5)))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5)), (s0[(s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3)]s1)= c3, s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2, c3 ∈ c6)
  eqeltrd(s0, c1, c4, (w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5)))
  simprl(w0, s0 = c4, s1 = c5)
  adantr(w0, (s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5), c4 ∈ c1)
  eqeltrd(s1, c2, c5, (w0 ∧(s0 = c4 ∧ s1 = c5)))
  simprr(w0, s0 = c4, s1 = c5)
  adantrr(w0, s0 = c4, s1 = c5, c5 ∈ c2)
  ovmpt4g(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3, c6, (s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  eqid((s0 ∈ c1, s1 ∈ c2 ↦ c3))
  diff.wa.s(s1, w0, s0 = c4)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c4)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

thm ovmpt2dv(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), w1))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(c5, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))), wcel(c3, c6))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))), wi(wceq(co(c4, c0, c5), c3), w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  ovmpt2df(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c6, w0, w1)
  nfcv(s0, c0)
  nfv(s0, w1)
  nfcv(s1, c0)
  nfv(s1, w1)
}

thm ovmpt2dv2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wi(wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), wceq(co(c4, c0, c5), c6)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c1))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c4)), wcel(c5, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))), wcel(c3, c7))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(c3, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c6)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c6)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)), wceq(co(c4, c0, c5), c6), wceq(co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c6))
  mpd(w0, wceq(co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c6), wceq(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)))
  eqidd(cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), w0)
  ovmpt2df(s0, s1, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, c7, w0, wceq(co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c6))
  biimpd(wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c3), wceq(co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c6))
  eqeq2d(co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c3, c6, wa(w0, wa(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wceq(cv(s1), c5))))
  nfeq1(s0, co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c6)
  nfov(s0, c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5)
  nfcv(s0, c4)
  nfmpt21(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s0, c5)
  nfeq1(s1, co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), c6)

  nfcv(s1, c4)
  nfmpt22(s1, s0, c1, c2, c3)
  nfcv(s1, c5)
  eqeq1d(co(c4, c0, c5), c6, co(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c5), wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3)))
  oveq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, c1, c2, c3), c4, c5)

thm ovmpt2g(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8) {

  fnopfvb(coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w2)), copab(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), cop(c0, c2), cv(hs0))
  adantl(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wcel(cop(cop(c0, c2), c4), coprab(s0, s1, s2, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), w2))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), w1)))

thm oprres(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2))))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c0, cxp(c2, c2), c4))
  -| wi(w0, wf(c1, cxp(c3, c3), c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpbird(w0, wceq(c0, cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2))), wa(wceq(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c2, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cv(s1)))))))
  jctil(w0, wceq(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c2, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cv(s1))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c2, c2, w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cv(s1))))
  eqtr4d(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2))))
  3expb(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
  adantl(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))))
  ovres(cv(s0), c2, cv(s1), c2, c1)
  eqid(cxp(c2, c2))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wceq(c0, cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2))), wa(wceq(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c2, c2)), wral(s0, c2, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cv(s1))))))), wfn(c0, cxp(c2, c2)), wfn(cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c2, c2)))
  ffnd(c0, cxp(c2, c2), c4, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wfn(cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), cxp(c2, c2)), wfn(c1, cxp(c3, c3)), wss(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c3, c3)))
  ffnd(c1, cxp(c3, c3), c5, w0)
  syl2anc(w0, wss(cxp(c2, c2), cxp(c3, c3)), wss(c2, c3), wss(c2, c3))
  xpss12(c2, c3, c2, c3)
  fnssres(c1, cxp(c3, c3), cxp(c2, c2))
  eqfnov(s0, s1, c0, c2, c2, cres(c1, cxp(c2, c2)), c2, c2)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c1, cxp(c2, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c2, c2)
  diff.cres.s(s1, c1, cxp(c2, c2))
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c2, c2)
}

thm oprssov(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c3))), wceq(co(c4, c0, c5), co(c4, c1, c5)))
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(c4, c0, c5), co(c4, c1, c5), co(c4, cres(c0, cxp(c2, c3)), c5), wa(w3a(wfun(c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c3))))
  adantl(w3a(wfun(c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c3)), wceq(co(c4, cres(c0, cxp(c2, c3)), c5), co(c4, c0, c5)))
  ovres(c4, c2, c5, c3, c0)
  adantr(w3a(wfun(c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c0)), wa(wcel(c4, c2), wcel(c5, c3)), wceq(co(c4, cres(c0, cxp(c2, c3)), c5), co(c4, c1, c5)))
  oveqd(c4, cres(c0, cxp(c2, c3)), c5, c1, w3a(wfun(c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c0)))
  eqtr3d(cres(c0, cxp(c2, c3)), c1, cres(c0, cdm(c1)), w3a(wfun(c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c0)))
  3ad2ant2(wfun(c0), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c3)), wss(c1, c0), wceq(cres(c0, cdm(c1)), cres(c0, cxp(c2, c3))))
  reseq2d(c0, cdm(c1), cxp(c2, c3), wfn(c1, cxp(c2, c3)))
  fndm(c1, cxp(c2, c3))
