thm fnrnov(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)), wceq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
} = {
  syl6eq(crn(c0), cab(s0, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))), cab(s0, wrex(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wfn(c0, cxp(c1, c2)))
  fnrnfv(s0, hs0, c0, cxp(c1, c2))
  abbii(s0, wrex(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  rexxp(hs0, s1, s2, c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), cfv(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0)
  df-ov(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cxp(c1, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s2, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm fnrnov(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[Fn](c1 × c2)→ ran(c0)= { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s0 =(s1[c0]s2)))})
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
} = {
  syl6eq(ran(c0), { s0 | ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s0 =(s1[c0]s2)))}, { s0 | ∃(hs0 ∈(c1 × c2), s0 =(c0 ` hs0))}, c0[Fn](c1 × c2))
  fnrnfv(s0, hs0, c0, (c1 × c2))
  abbii(s0, ∃(hs0 ∈(c1 × c2), s0 =(c0 ` hs0)), ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s0 =(s1[c0]s2))))
  rexxp(hs0, s1, s2, c1, c2, s0 =(c0 ` hs0), s0 =(s1[c0]s2))
  eqeq2d(s0, (c0 ` hs0), (s1[c0]s2), hs0 = < s1, s2 >)
  syl6eqr((c0 ` hs0), (s1[c0]s2), (c0 ` < s1, s2 >), hs0 = < s1, s2 >)
  fveq2(hs0, < s1, s2 >, c0)
  df-ov(s1, c0, s2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 × c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 =(s1[c0]s2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, (c0 ` hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, s0, (c0 ` hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)

  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
}

thm foov(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wfo(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)

  -| diffsc(s1, c2)

} = {
  bitri(wfo(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))), wa(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))))))
  dffo3(s0, hs0, c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3)
  anbi2i(wf(c0, cxp(c1, c2), c3), wral(s0, c3, wrex(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))))), wral(s0, c3, wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)))))))
  ralbii(s0, c3, wrex(hs0, cxp(c1, c2), wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))), wrex(s1, c1, wrex(s2, c2, wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))))
  rexxp(hs0, s1, s2, c1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0))), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))
  eqeq2d(cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  syl6eqr(cfv(c0, cv(hs0)), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), cfv(c0, cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wceq(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  fveq2(cv(hs0), cop(cv(s1), cv(s2)), c0)
  df-ov(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

  diff.hs0.c(c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, c0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, cv(s0), cfv(c0, cv(hs0)))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)

  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)

thm foov(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 :(c1 × c2)↠ c3)↔((c0 :(c1 × c2)→ c3)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ c3, ∃(s1 ∈ c1, ∃(s2 ∈ c2, s0 =(s1[c0]s2))))))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)

  ssun1(cima(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), csn(emptycls))
  syl5eqel(co(c0, c4, c2), cima(c4, cxp(c1, c3)), cfv(c4, cop(c0, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), emptycls))))
  syl2an(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wn(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), emptycls)), wcel(cfv(c4, cop(c0, c2)), cima(c4, cxp(c1, c3))), wcel(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3)), wn(wceq(cfv(c4, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls)))
  opelxpi(c0, c1, c2, c3)
  biimpi(wn(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), emptycls)), wn(wceq(cfv(c4, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls)))
  notbii(wceq(co(c0, c4, c2), emptycls), wceq(cfv(c4, cop(c0, c2)), emptycls))
  eqeq1i(co(c0, c4, c2), emptycls, cfv(c4, cop(c0, c2)))
  df-ov(c0, c4, c2)
  eliman0(cop(c0, c2), cxp(c1, c3), c4)
}

blocks.name: oprssdm
blocks.content: Domain of closure of an operation. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprssdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(cxp(c0, c0), cdm(c1))
  -| wn(wcel(emptycls, c0))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
} = {
  relssi(s0, s1, cxp(c0, c0), cdm(c1))
  relxp(c0, c0)
  sylbi(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cxp(c0, c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  opelxp(cv(s0), cv(s1), c0, c0)
  syl(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c1)), wcel(cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c0))
  syl5eqelr(cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c0, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)))
  df-ov(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1))
  con4i(wcel(cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c0), wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c1)))
  mtbiri(wn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c1))), wcel(cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c0), wcel(emptycls, c0))
  eleq1d(cfv(c1, cop(cv(s0), cv(s1))), c0, emptycls, wn(wcel(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), cdm(c1))))
  ndmfv(cop(cv(s0), cv(s1)), c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm oprssdm(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 × c0)⊆ dom(c1)
  ⊣ ¬ ∅ ∈ c0
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
} = {
  relssi(s0, s1, (c0 × c0), dom(c1))
  relxp(c0, c0)
  sylbi(< s0, s1 > ∈(c0 × c0), < s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c1), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  opelxp(s0, s1, c0, c0)
  syl((s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0), < s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c1), (c1 ` < s0, s1 >)∈ c0)
  syl5eqelr((c1 ` < s0, s1 >), c0, (s0[c1]s1), (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0))
  df-ov(s0, c1, s1)
  con4i((c1 ` < s0, s1 >)∈ c0, < s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c1))
  mtbiri(¬ < s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c1), (c1 ` < s0, s1 >)∈ c0, ∅ ∈ c0)
  eleq1d((c1 ` < s0, s1 >), c0, emptycls, ¬ < s0, s1 > ∈ dom(c1))
  ndmfv(< s0, s1 >, c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s0, c0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s0, c1)
  diff.cxp.s(s1, c0, c0)
  diff.cdm.s(s1, c1)
}

blocks.name: ndmovcl
blocks.content: The closure of an operation outside its domain, when the domain includes the empty set. This technical lemma can make the operation more convenient to work in some cases. It is dependent on our particular definitions of operation value, function value, and ordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 24-Sep-2004.)

blocks.name: ndmovass
blocks.content: Any operation is associative outside its domain, if the domain doesn't contain the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm ndmovass(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3))))
  -| wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c1, c1))
  -| wn(wcel(emptycls, c1))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3)), emptycls, wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))))
  syl(wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c1), wcel(c3, c1))))
  con3i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c1), wcel(c3, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1)))
  anim1i(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c1), wcel(c3, c1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  ndmovrcl(c0, c4, c2, c1)
  df-3an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  ndmov(co(c0, c4, c2), c1, c3, c4)
  syl(wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3)), emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c1))))
  con3i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, c4, c3), c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  ndmovrcl(c2, c4, c3, c1)
  3anass(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  ndmov(c0, c1, co(c2, c4, c3), c4)
}

blocks.name: ndmovdistr
blocks.content: Any operation is distributive outside its domain, if the domain doesn't contain the empty set. (Contributed by NM, 24-Aug-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm ndmovdistr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(c0, c4, co(c2, c5, c3)), co(co(c0, c4, c2), c5, co(c0, c4, c3))))
  -| wceq(cdm(c5), cxp(c1, c1))
  -| wn(wcel(emptycls, c1))
  -| wceq(cdm(c4), cxp(c1, c1))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(c0, c4, co(c2, c5, c3)), co(co(c0, c4, c2), c5, co(c0, c4, c3)), emptycls, wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))))
  syl(wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(c0, c4, co(c2, c5, c3)), emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, c5, c3), c1))))
  con3i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, c5, c3), c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, c5, c3), c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))))
  anim2i(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(co(c2, c5, c3), c1), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  ndmovrcl(c2, c5, c3, c1)
  3anass(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  ndmov(c0, c1, co(c2, c5, c3), c4)
  syl(wn(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c5, co(c0, c4, c3)), emptycls), wn(wa(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c1), wcel(co(c0, c4, c3), c1))))
  con3i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c1), wcel(co(c0, c4, c3), c1)))
  sylibr(wa(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c1), wcel(co(c0, c4, c3), c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1))))
  anim12i(wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c1), wcel(co(c0, c4, c3), c1), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c3, c1)))
  ndmovrcl(c0, c4, c2, c1)
  ndmovrcl(c0, c4, c3, c1)
  anandi3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  ndmov(co(c0, c4, c2), c1, co(c0, c4, c3), c5)
}

blocks.name: ndmovord
blocks.content: Elimination of redundant antecedents in an ordering law. (Contributed by NM, 7-Mar-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm ndmovord(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, c5, c2), c3, co(c0, c5, c4))))
  -| wceq(cdm(c5), cxp(c1, c1))
  -| wss(c3, cxp(c1, c1))
  -| wn(wcel(emptycls, c1))
  -| wi(w3a(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c0, c1)), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, c5, c2), c3, co(c0, c5, c4))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, c5, c2), c3, co(c0, c5, c4)))), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1)))
  3expia(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, c5, c2), c3, co(c0, c5, c4))))
  a1d(wn(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1))), wcel(c0, c1), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, c5, c2), c3, co(c0, c5, c4))))
  pm5.21ni(wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, c5, c2), c3, co(c0, c5, c4)))
  brel(c2, c3, c4, c1, c1)
  syl(wbr(co(c0, c5, c2), c3, co(c0, c5, c4)), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1)), wa(wcel(co(c0, c5, c2), c1), wcel(co(c0, c5, c4), c1)))
  brel(co(c0, c5, c2), c3, co(c0, c5, c4), c1, c1)
  anim12i(wcel(co(c0, c5, c2), c1), wcel(co(c0, c5, c4), c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c4, c1))
  simprd(wcel(co(c0, c5, c2), c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  ndmovrcl(c0, c5, c2, c1)
  simprd(wcel(co(c0, c5, c4), c1), wcel(c4, c1), wcel(c0, c1))
  ndmovrcl(c0, c5, c4, c1)
}

blocks.name: ndmovordi
blocks.content: Elimination of redundant antecedent in an ordering law. (Contributed by NM, 25-Jun-1998.)
blocks.origin:
thm ndmovordi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4)), wbr(c2, c3, c4))
  -| wceq(cdm(c1), cxp(c5, c5))
  -| wss(c3, cxp(c5, c5))
  -| wn(wcel(emptycls, c5))
  -| wi(wcel(c0, c5), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4))))
} = {
  mpcom(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4)), wbr(c2, c3, c4), wcel(c0, c5))
  syl(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4)), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c5))
  simpld(wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4)), wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c5), wcel(co(c0, c1, c4), c5))
  brel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4), c5, c5)
  simpld(wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c5), wcel(c0, c5), wcel(c2, c5))
  ndmovrcl(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  biimprd(wcel(c0, c5), wbr(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4)), wbr(c2, c3, c4))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ndmovordi(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4)→ c2[c3]c4)
  ⊣ dom(c1)=(c5 × c5)
  ⊣ c3 ⊆(c5 × c5)
  ⊣ ¬ ∅ ∈ c5
  ⊣ (c0 ∈ c5 →(c2[c3]c4 ↔(c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4)))
} = {
  mpcom((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4), c2[c3]c4, c0 ∈ c5)
  syl((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4), c0 ∈ c5, (c0[c1]c2)∈ c5)
  simpld((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4), (c0[c1]c2)∈ c5, (c0[c1]c4)∈ c5)
  brel((c0[c1]c2), c3, (c0[c1]c4), c5, c5)
  simpld((c0[c1]c2)∈ c5, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5)
  ndmovrcl(c0, c1, c2, c5)
  biimprd(c0 ∈ c5, (c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4), c2[c3]c4)
}

blocks.name: caovclg
blocks.content: Convert an operation closure law to class notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm caovclg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpan9(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c3, w0, wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5))
  rspc2v(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, wcel(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, c2), c5), wcel(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c5))
  eleq1d(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c5, co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c4, cv(s1))
  eleq1d(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c5, co(c0, c4, c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c5)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, co(c0, c4, c2), c5)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caovclg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧(c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))→(c0[c4]c2)∈ c5)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))→(s0[c4]s1)∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  mpan9(w0, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c0[c4]c2)∈ c5, ∀(s0 ∈ c1, ∀(s1 ∈ c3,(s0[c4]s1)∈ c5)))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c3, w0, (s0[c4]s1)∈ c5)
  rspc2v(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c3, (s0[c4]s1)∈ c5, (c0[c4]c2)∈ c5, (c0[c4]s1)∈ c5)
  eleq1d((s0[c4]s1), c5, (c0[c4]s1), s0 = c0)
  oveq1(s0, c0, c4, s1)
  eleq1d((c0[c4]s1), c5, (c0[c4]c2), s1 = c2)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c0, c4)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, (c0[c4]s1), c5)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, (c0[c4]c2), c5)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
}

blocks.name: caovcld
blocks.content: Convert an operation closure law to class notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Dec-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm caovcld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  syl12anc(w0, wcel(co(c0, c1, c2), c3), w0, wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5))
  id(w0)
  caovclg(s0, s1, c0, c4, c2, c5, c1, c3, w0)
}

thm caovcld(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c3)

blocks.name: caovcl
blocks.content: Convert an operation closure law to class notation. (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-May-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm caovcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), c1))
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpan(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(co(c0, c3, c2), c1), wtru)
  tru()
  caovclg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, c1, wtru)
  adantl(wtru, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1))
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
}

thm caovcl(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1)→(c0[c3]c2)∈ c1)
  ⊣ ((s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1)→(s0[c3]s1)∈ c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
} = {
  mpan((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c1), (c0[c3]c2)∈ c1, wtru)
  tru()
  caovclg(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, c1, wtru)
  adantl(wtru, (s0 ∈ c1 ∧ s1 ∈ c1), (s0[c3]s1)∈ c1)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
}

blocks.content: Convert an operation commutative law to class notation. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jun-2013.)

thm caovcomg(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  mpan9(w0, wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))))))
  ralrimivva(s0, s1, c1, c1, w0, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))))
  rspc2v(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0))), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0)), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, c0)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c3, cv(s1))
  oveq2(cv(s0), c0, cv(s1), c3)
  eqeq12d(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, c0), co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c3)
  oveq1(cv(s1), c2, c3, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, c0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c3, cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), c3, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(c0, c3, c2), co(c2, c3, c0))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c3, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, c3, c0)
}

thm caovcomd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {

} = {

thm caovcomd(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c1]c0))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c3 ∧ s1 ∈ c3))→(s0[c1]s1)=(s1[c1]s0))

thm caovcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c1, c0))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  mp2an(wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c2, c1, c0)), wcel(c0, universe), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)))
  pm3.2i(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  caovcomg(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, c1, wcel(c0, universe))
  a1i(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wa(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caovcom(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c1]c0)
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0[c1]s1)=(s1[c1]s0)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mp2an((c0[c1]c2)=(c2[c1]c0), c0 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌))
  pm3.2i(c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  caovcomg(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, c1, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1i((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌)), (s0[c1]s1)=(s1[c1]s0))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, c0, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
}

thm caovassg(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1), wcel(cv(s2), c1))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3)))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3)))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3)))), diffsc(s1, c3))
  mpan9(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3))), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c1, wral(s2, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))))))))
  ralrimivvva(s0, s1, s2, c1, c1, c1, w0, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))))
  rspc3v(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c1, c3, c1, wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(c0, c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))), wceq(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, cv(s2)), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, cv(s2)))))
  eqeq12d(co(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))), co(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(c0, c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1d(co(cv(s0), c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2), co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c4, cv(s1))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))
  eqeq12d(co(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(c0, c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))), co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, cv(s2)), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq1d(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2), co(c0, c4, c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c4)
  oveq2d(c0, c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)), co(c2, c4, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq1(cv(s1), c2, c4, cv(s2))
  eqeq12d(co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, cv(s2)), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, cv(s2))), co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3)), wceq(cv(s2), c3))
  oveq2(cv(s2), c3, co(c0, c4, c2), c4)
  oveq2d(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, cv(s2)), co(c2, c4, c3), wceq(cv(s2), c3))
  oveq2(cv(s2), c3, c2, c4)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2)), co(c0, c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))))
  diff.co.s(s0, co(c0, c4, cv(s1)), c4, cv(s2))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c4, co(cv(s1), c4, cv(s2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, cv(s1), c4, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, cv(s2)), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, cv(s2))))
  diff.co.s(s1, co(c0, c4, c2), c4, cv(s2))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c4, co(c2, c4, cv(s2)))
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, c4, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, co(co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3), co(c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3)))
  diff.co.s(s2, co(c0, c4, c2), c4, c3)
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, c4, c2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, c4, co(c2, c4, c3))
  diff.co.s(s2, c2, c4, c3)
}

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))

thm caovass(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  mp3an(wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe))
  mpan(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c3, universe)), wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, c3), co(c0, c1, co(c2, c1, c3))), wtru)
  tru()
  caovassg(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c2, c3, c1, wtru)
  a1i(wa(wtru, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe), wcel(cv(s2), universe))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s2)
}

thm caovass(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=(c0[c1](c2[c1]c3))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c3 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ ((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
} = {
  mp3an(((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=(c0[c1](c2[c1]c3)), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpan((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c3 ∈ 𝕌), ((c0[c1]c2)[c1]c3)=(c0[c1](c2[c1]c3)), wtru)
  tru()
  caovassg(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c2, c3, c1, wtru)
  a1i((T ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s2 ∈ 𝕌)), ((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2)))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s2)
}

thm caovcang(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))), wb(wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4)), wceq(c2, c4)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wcel(cv(s2), c3))), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))), wb(wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))), wb(wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))), diffsc(s0, c4))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3))), wb(wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))), diffsc(s1, c4))
  mpan9(w0, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c3)), wb(wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4)), wceq(c2, c4)), wral(s0, c1, wral(s1, c3, wral(s2, c3, wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))))
  ralrimivvva(s0, s1, s2, c1, c3, c3, w0, wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  rspc3v(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c3, wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4)), wceq(c2, c4)), wb(wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wb(wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, cv(s2))), wceq(c2, cv(s2))))
  bibi1d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s2))))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2)), co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c5, cv(s1))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c5, cv(s2))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, cv(s2))), wceq(c2, cv(s2)))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s2)), co(c0, c5, c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c5)
  eqeq1(cv(s1), c2, cv(s2))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, cv(s2))), wceq(c2, cv(s2)), wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))
  eqeq2d(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, cv(s2)), co(c0, c5, c4), wceq(cv(s2), c4))
  oveq2(cv(s2), c4, c0, c5)
  eqeq2(cv(s2), c4, c2)
  diff.wb.s(s0, wceq(co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, co(c0, c5, cv(s1)), co(c0, c5, cv(s2)))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c5, cv(s1))
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c5, cv(s2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(s1), cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wb.s(s1, wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, cv(s2))), wceq(c2, cv(s2)))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, cv(s2)))
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c5, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c5, cv(s2))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, c2, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.wb.s(s2, wceq(co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))
  diff.wceq.s(s2, co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4))
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, c5, c2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, c5, c4)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, c2, c4)
}

thm caovcand(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c1, c3)), wceq(c2, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c5))), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl13anc(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c0, c1, c3)), wceq(c2, c3)), w0, wcel(c0, c4), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(c3, c5))
  id(w0)
  caovcang(s0, s1, s2, c0, c4, c2, c5, c3, c1, w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caovcand(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →((c0[c1]c2)=(c0[c1]c3)↔ c2 = c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c5 ∧ s2 ∈ c5))→((s0[c1]s1)=(s0[c1]s2)↔ s1 = s2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl13anc(w0, ((c0[c1]c2)=(c0[c1]c3)↔ c2 = c3), w0, c0 ∈ c4, c2 ∈ c5, c3 ∈ c5)
  id(w0)
  caovcang(s0, s1, s2, c0, c4, c2, c5, c3, c1, w0)
}

thm caovcanrd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c3)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(cv(s2), c5))), wb(wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c5), wcel(cv(s1), c5))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  bitr3d(w0, wceq(co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c2)), wceq(c0, c3), wceq(co(c2, c1, c0), co(c2, c1, c3)))
  eqeq12d(co(c2, c1, c0), co(c2, c1, c3), co(c0, c1, c2), co(c3, c1, c2), w0)
  caovcomd(s0, s1, c2, c1, c0, c5, w0)
  caovcomd(s0, s1, c2, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  caovcand(s0, s1, s2, c2, c1, c0, c3, c4, c5, w0)
}

thm caovcan(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(c2, c4)))
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
  -| wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))), diffsc(s2, c2))
  vtocl2ga(s0, s1, c0, c1, c2, c1, wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(c2, c4)), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c4)), wi(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c4)))
  imbi1d(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c4), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c3, c4)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, c4), co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c3, c4), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c3, cv(s1))
  oveq1(cv(s0), c0, c3, c4)
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c4), wceq(co(c0, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c4)), wceq(c2, c4))
  eqeq1d(co(c0, c3, cv(s1)), co(c0, c3, c4), co(c0, c3, c2), wceq(cv(s1), c2))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c2, c0, c3)
  eqeq1(cv(s1), c2, c4)
  vtocl(s2, c4, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c4))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c1), wcel(cv(s1), c1)), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2))), wi(wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c4)))
  imbi12d(wceq(cv(s2), c4), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, c4)), wceq(cv(s1), c4))
  eqeq2d(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c3, c4), wceq(cv(s2), c4))

blocks.pretty:
thm caovordid(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0[c1]c2 →(c3[c4]c0)[c1](c3[c4]c2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c5 ∧ s1 ∈ c5 ∧ s2 ∈ c5))→(s0[c1]s1 →(s2[c4]s0)[c1](s2[c4]s1)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl13anc(w0, (c0[c1]c2 →(c3[c4]c0)[c1](c3[c4]c2)), w0, c0 ∈ c5, c2 ∈ c5, c3 ∈ c5)
  id(w0)
  caovordig(s0, s1, s2, c0, c5, c2, c3, c1, c4, w0)
}

  caovordg(s0, s1, s2, c0, c5, c2, c3, c1, c4, w0)
}

thm caovord(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  breq12d(co(cv(s0), c5, c2), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, c4), co(c0, c5, c2), co(c0, c5, c4), wceq(cv(s0), c0))

  imbi2d(wa(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4)), wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2)))), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, c2), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, c4))))
  sylan9bb(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wceq(cv(s2), c4), wb(wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2)))), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, c2), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, c4))), wb(wbr(c2, c3, cv(s2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, c2), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2)))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wbr(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s1)), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))), wbr(c2, c3, cv(s2)), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, c2), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, cv(s2))))

  diff.wbr.s(s1, c2, c3, c4)
  diff.wbr.s(s1, co(cv(s0), c5, c2), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, c4))
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), c5, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(s0), c5, c4)

  diff.wi.s(s2, wcel(cv(s0), c1), wb(wbr(c2, c3, c4), wbr(co(cv(s0), c5, c2), c3, co(cv(s0), c5, c4))))

  diff.co.s(s2, cv(s0), c5, c4)

thm caovdi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  mpan(w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), wceq(co(c0, c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, co(c0, c1, c4))), wtru)
  tru()
  caovdig(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c2, universe, c4, c1, c3, c3, wtru)
  a1i(wa(wtru, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), universe), wcel(cv(s1), universe), wcel(cv(s2), universe))), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c3, co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s2)))))

blocks.pretty:
thm caovdi(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ (c0[c1](c2[c3]c4))=((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c4 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0[c1](s1[c3]s2))=((s0[c1]s1)[c3](s0[c1]s2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  mp3an((c0[c1](c2[c3]c4))=((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4)), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c4 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpan((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c4 ∈ 𝕌), (c0[c1](c2[c3]c4))=((c0[c1]c2)[c3](c0[c1]c4)), wtru)
  tru()
  caovdig(s0, s1, s2, c0, universe, c2, universe, c4, c1, c3, c3, wtru)
  a1i((T ∧(s0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s1 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ s2 ∈ 𝕌)), (s0[c1](s1[c3]s2))=((s0[c1]s1)[c3](s0[c1]s2)))
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.universe.s(s2)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s2)
}

thm caov4(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0[c1]c2)[c1](c3[c1]c4))=((c0[c1]c3)[c1](c2[c1]c4))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c3 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0[c1]s1)=(s1[c1]s0)
  ⊣ ((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2))
  ⊣ c4 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)

  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  3eqtr4i(((c0[c1]c2)[c1](c3[c1]c4)), ((c0[c1]c3)[c1](c2[c1]c4)), (c0[c1](c2[c1](c3[c1]c4))), (c0[c1](c3[c1](c2[c1]c4))))
  oveq2i(c0, c1, (c2[c1](c3[c1]c4)), (c3[c1](c2[c1]c4)))
  caov12(s0, s1, s2, c2, c1, c3, c4)
  caovass(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, (c3[c1]c4))
  ovex(c3, c1, c4)
  caovass(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c3, (c2[c1]c4))
  ovex(c2, c1, c4)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, c1, c4)
  diff.co.s(s1, c3, c1, c4)
  diff.co.s(s2, c3, c1, c4)
  diff.co.s(s0, c2, c1, c4)
  diff.co.s(s1, c2, c1, c4)
  diff.co.s(s2, c2, c1, c4)
}

  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)

  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  eqtri(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c1, co(c3, c1, c4)), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c4, c1, c2)), co(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c2, c1, c4)))
  caov4(s0, s1, s2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4)
  oveq2i(co(c0, c1, c3), c1, co(c2, c1, c4), co(c4, c1, c2))
  caovcom(s0, s1, c2, c1, c4)
}

thm caovdir(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wceq(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(co(c0, c3, c4), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c4, universe)
  -| wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)))
  -| wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2))), co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c1, co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
} = {
  3eqtr3i(co(co(c0, c1, c2), c3, c4), co(co(c0, c3, c4), c1, co(c2, c3, c4)), co(c4, c3, co(c0, c1, c2)), co(co(c4, c3, c0), c1, co(c4, c3, c2)))
  caovdi(s0, s1, s2, c4, c3, c0, c1, c2)
  caovcom(s0, s1, c4, c3, co(c0, c1, c2))
  ovex(c0, c1, c2)
  oveq12i(co(c4, c3, c0), c1, co(c4, c3, c2), co(c0, c3, c4), co(c2, c3, c4))
  caovcom(s0, s1, c4, c3, c0)
  caovcom(s0, s1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm caovdir(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0[c1]c2)[c3]c4)=((c0[c3]c4)[c1](c2[c3]c4))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c4 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0[c3]s1)=(s1[c3]s0)
  ⊣ (s0[c3](s1[c1]s2))=((s0[c3]s1)[c1](s0[c3]s2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
} = {
  3eqtr3i(((c0[c1]c2)[c3]c4), ((c0[c3]c4)[c1](c2[c3]c4)), (c4[c3](c0[c1]c2)), ((c4[c3]c0)[c1](c4[c3]c2)))
  caovdi(s0, s1, s2, c4, c3, c0, c1, c2)
  caovcom(s0, s1, c4, c3, (c0[c1]c2))
  ovex(c0, c1, c2)
  oveq12i((c4[c3]c0), c1, (c4[c3]c2), (c0[c3]c4), (c2[c3]c4))
  caovcom(s0, s1, c4, c3, c0)
  caovcom(s0, s1, c4, c3, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
}

thm caovmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| diffss(s2, s3)

  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c1)
  -| diffsc(s3, c2)
  -| diffsc(s3, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wmo(s0, wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wmo(s0, wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), diffsc(s2, c0))
  a1ii(wmo(s0, wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), diffsc(s2, c3))

  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c3, wmo(s0, wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wmo(s0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  mobidv(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  oveq1(cv(hs0), c0, c1, cv(s0))
  mpgbir(s0, wmo(s0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wal(hs1, wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))))
  mo4(s0, hs1, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(hs1), cv(hs0), c1)
  ax-gen(hs1, wi(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs1))))
  3eqtr3d(cv(s0), cv(hs1), co(cv(s0), c1, c2), co(cv(hs1), c1, c2), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2)))

  elexi(c2, c3)
  vex(hs1)
  simpl2im(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, c2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c3))
  syl(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(s0), c3)), wcel(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c3))
  syl6eqel(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c3, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2)))

  vtoclga(s1, cv(s0), c3, wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, c2), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, c2), cv(s1)))
  eqeq12d(co(cv(s1), c1, c2), cv(s1), co(cv(s0), c1, c2), cv(s0), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  oveq1(cv(s1), cv(s0), c1, c2)
  id(wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  simpl2im(wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs1), c1, c2), cv(hs1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c3), wcel(cv(hs1), c3))

  syl6eqel(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c3, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2)))
  simpr(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1)), c2))
  ndmovrcl(cv(hs0), c1, cv(hs1), c3)

  oveq1(cv(s1), cv(hs1), c1, c2)
  id(wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs1)))
  moanimv(s0, wcel(c0, c3), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  moimi(s0, wa(wcel(c0, c3), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  ancri(wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(c0, c3))
  simpld(wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(cv(s0), c3))

  mpbiri(wceq(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(co(c0, c1, cv(s0)), c3), wcel(c2, c3))

thm caovmo(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2)
  ⊣ c2 ∈ c3
  ⊣ dom(c1)=(c3 × c3)
  ⊣ ¬ ∅ ∈ c3
  ⊣ (s1[c1]s2)=(s2[c1]s1)
  ⊣ ((s1[c1]s2)[c1]s3)=(s1[c1](s2[c1]s3))
  ⊣ (s1 ∈ c3 →(s1[c1]c2)= s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, s3)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s3)
  ⊣ d(s2, s3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s3, c0)
  ⊣ d(s3, c1)
  ⊣ d(s3, c2)
  ⊣ d(s3, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2), d(s1, c0))
  a1ii(∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2), d(s2, c0))
  a1ii(∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2), d(s2, c3))
  a1ii(∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2), d(s3, c0))
  a1ii(∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2), d(s3, c2))
  a1ii(∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2), d(s3, c3))
  ax-mp(∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2), ∃*(s0,(c0 ∈ c3 ∧(c0[c1]s0)= c2)))
  mpbir(∃*(s0,(c0 ∈ c3 ∧(c0[c1]s0)= c2)), (c0 ∈ c3 → ∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2)))
  vtoclg(hs0, c0, c3, ∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2), ∃*(s0,(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))
  mobidv(s0, hs0 = c0, (hs0[c1]s0)= c2, (c0[c1]s0)= c2)
  eqeq1d((hs0[c1]s0), c2, (c0[c1]s0), hs0 = c0)
  oveq1(hs0, c0, c1, s0)
  mpgbir(s0, ∃*(s0,(hs0[c1]s0)= c2), ∀(hs1,(((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2)→ s0 = hs1)))
  mo4(s0, hs1, (hs0[c1]s0)= c2, (hs0[c1]hs1)= c2)
  eqeq1d((hs0[c1]s0), c2, (hs0[c1]hs1), s0 = hs1)
  oveq2(s0, hs1, hs0, c1)
  ax-gen(hs1, (((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2)→ s0 = hs1))
  3eqtr3d(s0, hs1, (s0[c1]c2), (hs1[c1]c2), ((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2))
  eqtr3d((s0[c1]c2), (hs1[c1]c2), (s0[c1](hs0[c1]hs1)), ((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2))
  oveq2d(s0, c1, (hs0[c1]hs1), c2, ((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2))
  3eqtr3g((s0[c1](hs0[c1]hs1)), (hs1[c1]c2), ((hs0[c1]s0)[c1]hs1), (c2[c1]hs1), ((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2))
  oveq1d((hs0[c1]s0), c1, hs1, c2, ((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2))
  eqtri(((hs0[c1]s0)[c1]hs1), (s0[c1](hs0[c1]hs1)), (hs0[c1](s0[c1]hs1)))
  caovass(s1, s2, s3, hs0, c1, s0, hs1)
  caov12(s1, s2, s3, hs0, c1, s0, hs1)
  vex(hs0)
  vex(s0)
  caovcom(s1, s2, c2, c1, hs1)
  elexi(c2, c3)
  vex(hs1)
  simpl2im(((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2), (s0[c1]c2)= s0, hs0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈ c3)
  syl(((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2), (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ s0 ∈ c3), (hs0[c1]s0)∈ c3)
  syl6eqel((hs0[c1]s0), c3, c2, ((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2))
  simpl((hs0[c1]s0)= c2, (hs0[c1]hs1)= c2)
  ndmovrcl(hs0, c1, s0, c3)
  vtoclga(s1, s0, c3, (s0[c1]c2)= s0, (s1[c1]c2)= s1)
  eqeq12d((s1[c1]c2), s1, (s0[c1]c2), s0, s1 = s0)
  oveq1(s1, s0, c1, c2)
  id(s1 = s0)
  simpl2im(((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2), (hs1[c1]c2)= hs1, hs0 ∈ c3, hs1 ∈ c3)
  syl(((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2), (hs0 ∈ c3 ∧ hs1 ∈ c3), (hs0[c1]hs1)∈ c3)
  syl6eqel((hs0[c1]hs1), c3, c2, ((hs0[c1]s0)= c2 ∧(hs0[c1]hs1)= c2))
  simpr((hs0[c1]s0)= c2, (hs0[c1]hs1)= c2)
  ndmovrcl(hs0, c1, hs1, c3)
  vtoclga(s1, hs1, c3, (hs1[c1]c2)= hs1, (s1[c1]c2)= s1)
  eqeq12d((s1[c1]c2), s1, (hs1[c1]c2), hs1, s1 = hs1)
  oveq1(s1, hs1, c1, c2)
  id(s1 = hs1)
  moanimv(s0, c0 ∈ c3, (c0[c1]s0)= c2)
  moimi(s0, (c0 ∈ c3 ∧(c0[c1]s0)= c2), (c0[c1]s0)= c2)
  ancri((c0[c1]s0)= c2, c0 ∈ c3)
  simpld((c0[c1]s0)= c2, c0 ∈ c3, s0 ∈ c3)
  syl((c0[c1]s0)= c2, (c0 ∈ c3 ∧ s0 ∈ c3), (c0[c1]s0)∈ c3)
  mpbiri((c0[c1]s0)= c2, (c0[c1]s0)∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  eleq1((c0[c1]s0), c2, c3)
  ndmovrcl(c0, c1, s0, c3)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(∃*(s0,(c0[c1]s0)= c2))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (hs0[c1]hs1), c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, hs0, c1, hs1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.w((hs0[c1]s0)= c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s3)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s3, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s3)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (s0[c1]c2), s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, s0, c1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (hs1[c1]c2), hs1)
  diff.co.s(s1, hs1, c1, c2)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c3)
}

thm grprinvlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wcel(cv(s2), c2))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c3, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c3, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), c1)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(co(c0, c3, c0), c0))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c0, c1)), wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2), wcel(cv(s1), c2)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s1)), c2)))
  a1ii(wi(wa(w0, w1), wceq(c0, c1)), wi(w0, wcel(c1, c2)))
  rexlimddv(s1, c2, wa(w0, w1), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1))
  syl2an2r(w0, w1, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1)), wral(s2, c2, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), c1))), wcel(c0, c2))
  sylib(w0, wral(s2, c2, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), c1))), wral(s0, c2, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), c1))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), c1)))
  cbvralv(s0, s2, c2, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), c1)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), c1)))
  rexbidv(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), c1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s0)), c1, co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s2)))
  oveq2(cv(s0), cv(s2), cv(s1), c3)
  rspccva(s2, c2, c0, wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), c1)), wrex(s1, c2, wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1)))
  rexbidv(s1, c2, wceq(cv(s2), c0), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), c1), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), c3, cv(s2)), c1, co(cv(s1), c3, c0), wceq(cv(s2), c0))
  oveq2(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1), c3)
  3eqtr3d(c0, c1, co(cv(s1), c3, co(c0, c3, c0)), co(cv(s1), c3, c0), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1))))
  adantr(wa(w0, w1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1)), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, co(c0, c3, c0)), co(cv(s1), c3, c0)))
  oveq2d(cv(s1), c3, co(c0, c3, c0), c0, wa(w0, w1))
  3eqtr3d(co(cv(s1), c3, co(c0, c3, c0)), c0, co(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c3, c0), co(c1, c3, c0), wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1))))
  oveq1d(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c3, c0, c1, wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1))))
  caovassd(hs0, hs1, hs2, cv(s1), c3, c0, c0, c2, wa(wa(w0, w1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1))))
  ad4ant14(w0, w1, wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1)), w3a(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(cv(hs2), c2)), wceq(co(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(hs1)), c3, cv(hs2)), co(cv(hs0), c3, co(cv(hs1), c3, cv(hs2)))))
  caovassg(s0, s1, s2, cv(hs0), c2, cv(hs1), cv(hs2), c3, w0)
  simprl(wa(w0, w1), wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1))
  adantr(wa(w0, w1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1)), wcel(c0, c2))
  adantr(wa(w0, w1), wa(wcel(cv(s1), c2), wceq(co(cv(s1), c3, c0), c1)), wceq(co(c1, c3, c0), c0))
  rspcdva(s1, c0, c2, wa(w0, w1), wceq(co(c1, c3, c0), c0), wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq12d(co(c1, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1), co(c1, c3, c0), c0, wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  oveq2(cv(s1), c0, c1, c3)
  id(wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  adantr(w0, w1, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1))))
  sylib(w0, wral(s1, c2, wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1))), wral(s0, c2, wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0))))
  ralrimiva(s0, c2, w0, wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  cbvralv(s0, s1, c2, wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(c1, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
  eqeq12d(co(c1, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(c1, c3, cv(s1)), cv(s1), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))

blocks.name: grprinvd
blocks.content: Deduce right inverse from left inverse and left identity in an associative structure (such as a group). (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)

thm grprinvd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ w1)→(c0[c1]c2)= c3)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c4)→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→(c3[c1]s0)= s0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c4 ∧ s1 ∈ c4 ∧ s2 ∈ c4))→((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c4)→ ∃(s1 ∈ c4,(s1[c1]s0)= c3))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ w1)→ c0 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ w1)→ c2 ∈ c4)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ w1)→(c2[c1]c0)= c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c3)
  ⊣ d(s1, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  grprinvlem(s0, s1, s2, (c0[c1]c2), c3, c4, c1, w0, w1)
  eqtrd(((c0[c1]c2)[c1](c0[c1]c2)), (c0[c1]c2), (c0[c1](c2[c1](c0[c1]c2))), (w0 ∧ w1))
  caovassd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2, (c0[c1]c2), c4, (w0 ∧ w1))
  caovcld(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c4, c4, c4, (w0 ∧ w1))
  adantlr(w0, w1, (hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4), (hs0[c1]hs1)∈ c4)
  caovclg(s0, s1, hs0, c4, hs1, c4, c1, c4, w0)
  3expb(w0, s0 ∈ c4, s1 ∈ c4, (s0[c1]s1)∈ c4)
  oveq2d(c0, c1, (c2[c1](c0[c1]c2)), c2, (w0 ∧ w1))
  3eqtr3d((c2[c1](c0[c1]c2)), c2, ((c2[c1]c0)[c1]c2), (c3[c1]c2), (w0 ∧ w1))
  oveq1d((c2[c1]c0), c1, c2, c3, (w0 ∧ w1))
  caovassd(hs0, hs1, hs2, c2, c1, c0, c2, c4, (w0 ∧ w1))
  adantlr(w0, w1, (hs0 ∈ c4 ∧ hs1 ∈ c4 ∧ hs2 ∈ c4), ((hs0[c1]hs1)[c1]hs2)=(hs0[c1](hs1[c1]hs2)))
  caovassg(s0, s1, s2, hs0, c4, hs1, hs2, c1, w0)
  rspcdva(s1, c2, c4, (w0 ∧ w1), (c3[c1]c2)= c2, (c3[c1]s1)= s1)
  eqeq12d((c3[c1]s1), s1, (c3[c1]c2), c2, s1 = c2)
  oveq2(s1, c2, c3, c1)
  id(s1 = c2)
  adantr(w0, w1, ∀(s1 ∈ c4,(c3[c1]s1)= s1))
  sylib(w0, ∀(s1 ∈ c4,(c3[c1]s1)= s1), ∀(s0 ∈ c4,(c3[c1]s0)= s0))
  ralrimiva(s0, c4, w0, (c3[c1]s0)= s0)
  cbvralv(s0, s1, c4, (c3[c1]s0)= s0, (c3[c1]s1)= s1)
  eqeq12d((c3[c1]s0), s0, (c3[c1]s1), s1, s0 = s1)
  oveq2(s0, s1, c3, c1)
  id(s0 = s1)
  diff.co.s(s1, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.co.s(s2, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ w1))
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧ w1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((c0[c1]c2))
  diff.hs1.c((c0[c1]c2))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c((c0[c1]c2))
  diff.hs2.c(c4)
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧ w1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (c3[c1]c2), c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c3, c1, c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, (c3[c1]s1), s1)
  diff.co.s(s0, c3, c1, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (c3[c1]s0), s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c3, c1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: grpridd
blocks.content: Deduce right identity from left inverse and left identity in an associative structure (such as a group). (Contributed by NM, 10-Aug-2013.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 6-Jan-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm grpridd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c1, c2), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0)), wcel(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c0))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(c2, c1, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(s1), c0), wcel(cv(s2), c0))), wceq(co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(s1)), c1, cv(s2)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s2)))))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d(co(cv(s0), c1, c2), cv(s0), co(c2, c1, cv(s0)), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  rexlimddv(hs0, c0, wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wceq(co(c2, c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c1, c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  sylib(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wrex(hs0, c0, wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wrex(s1, c0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  cbvrexv(s1, hs0, c0, wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  eqeq1d(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(hs0)))
  oveq1(cv(s1), cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  anassrs(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wceq(co(c2, c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c1, c2)))
  3eqtr3d(co(c2, c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c1, c2), co(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  caovassd(hs1, hs2, hs3, cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0), cv(s0), c0, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  adantlr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2))), w3a(wcel(cv(hs1), c0), wcel(cv(hs2), c0), wcel(cv(hs3), c0)), wceq(co(co(cv(hs1), c1, cv(hs2)), c1, cv(hs3)), co(cv(hs1), c1, co(cv(hs2), c1, cv(hs3)))))
  caovassg(s0, s1, s2, cv(hs1), c0, cv(hs2), cv(hs3), c1, w0)
  oveq1d(co(cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0)), c1, cv(s0), c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  grprinvd(s0, s1, s2, cv(s0), c1, cv(hs0), c2, c0, w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2))))
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  simprrl(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  oveq2d(cv(s0), c1, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2, wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  simprrr(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(c2, c1, cv(s0)), co(cv(s0), c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(co(cv(s1), c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  diff.hs3.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, co(cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0)), c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, cv(hs0), c1, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm grpridd(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(s0[c1]c2)= s0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0)→(s0[c1]s1)∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→(c2[c1]s0)= s0)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ s1 ∈ c0 ∧ s2 ∈ c0))→((s0[c1]s1)[c1]s2)=(s0[c1](s1[c1]s2)))
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s1[c1]s0)= c2))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  eqtr3d((s0[c1]c2), s0, (c2[c1]s0), (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  rexlimddv(hs0, c0, (w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), (c2[c1]s0)=(s0[c1]c2), (hs0[c1]s0)= c2)
  sylib((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0), ∃(hs0 ∈ c0,(hs0[c1]s0)= c2), ∃(s1 ∈ c0,(s1[c1]s0)= c2))
  cbvrexv(s1, hs0, c0, (s1[c1]s0)= c2, (hs0[c1]s0)= c2)
  eqeq1d((s1[c1]s0), c2, (hs0[c1]s0), s1 = hs0)
  oveq1(s1, hs0, c1, s0)
  anassrs(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2), (c2[c1]s0)=(s0[c1]c2))
  3eqtr3d((c2[c1]s0), (s0[c1]c2), ((s0[c1]hs0)[c1]s0), (s0[c1](hs0[c1]s0)), (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))))
  caovassd(hs1, hs2, hs3, s0, c1, hs0, s0, c0, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))))
  adantlr(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2)), (hs1 ∈ c0 ∧ hs2 ∈ c0 ∧ hs3 ∈ c0), ((hs1[c1]hs2)[c1]hs3)=(hs1[c1](hs2[c1]hs3)))
  caovassg(s0, s1, s2, hs1, c0, hs2, hs3, c1, w0)
  oveq1d((s0[c1]hs0), c1, s0, c2, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))))
  grprinvd(s0, s1, s2, s0, c1, hs0, c2, c0, w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2)))
  simprl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))
  simprrl(w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0[c1]s0)= c2)
  oveq2d(s0, c1, (hs0[c1]s0), c2, (w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))))
  simprrr(w0, s0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0[c1]s0)= c2)
  diff.hs0.w((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c2[c1]s0)=(s0[c1]c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w((s1[c1]s0)= c2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.c(s0)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(s0)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs3.c(s0)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs3.c(hs0)
  diff.hs3.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))))
  diff.hs2.w((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))))
  diff.hs3.w((w0 ∧(s0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs1)
  diff.hs1.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs2)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs2)
  diff.hs2.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs3)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs3)
  diff.hs3.s(s2)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s2, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.wa.s(s1, s0 ∈ c0, (hs0 ∈ c0 ∧(hs0[c1]s0)= c2))
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, hs0 ∈ c0, (hs0[c1]s0)= c2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, (hs0[c1]s0), c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, hs0, c1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
